Title: 🇺🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 On the US reaction to Russia's use of a medium-range...
Description: 🇺🇸🇷🇺🇺🇦 On the US reaction to Russia’s use of the medium-range missile system - Oreshnik - Vladimir Putin’s speech yesterday about the use of the new hypersonic missile - Oreshnik - made the headlines in American newspapers - what shocked the West most was not so much the new Russian weapons, but statement by the Russian president about the escalation of the Ukrainian conflict into a global one.▪️On social networks There are speculations about who will be hit by the first Russian strike, and they are also weighing the risks of a nuclear war. It is noteworthy that the majority agrees with the theses of popular political bloggers that the people of Western countries do not want war - they are being pushed towards it by -crazy elderly politicians-.▪️As ​​for the US administration, its representatives pretended that they were not surprised by anything - White House yesterday said that the launch of a Russian missile would not have a deterrent effect on Washington’s policy towards Ukraine.▪️The Pentagon was more objective and did without bravado statements - the American Department of Defense expressed concern about the emergence of new weapons in Russia, however, they mentioned that the United States had been warned in advance about their use by the Russian side.▪️The press perceived Russia’s use of Oreshnik as ambiguous: while the New York Times rightly characterized happened - a new stage in the Russian-Ukrainian conflict - rabid propagandists from CNN launched the old barrel organ that such Russia has two or three missile launches left.▪️Donald Trump’s team and the future president himself did not pay any attention to Putin’s statements yesterday - they are now having their own war. Trump is struggling to form his cabinet - one of his close allies has already been defeated and was forced to refuse the appointment. #Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸🇷🇺 CNN, against the backdrop of Vladimir Putin’s statement, started an old song that -Russia has two or three missile launches left-. True, now they say this about -Hazel-, and not -Daggers-. In American social networks, meanwhile, the hashtag -ICBM- is at the top - intercontinental...

Title: 🇺🇸🇨🇳🌏 And again about the analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacif...
Description: 🇺🇸🇨🇳🌏 And again about the NATO analogue in the Asia-Pacific region Compared to a month earlier, the topic of the NATO analogue in the Asia-Pacific region has calmed down a little. This is due to the reasons that we described earlier, namely the lack of such plans among potential member countries of the union. 🔻However, this does not mean that such an idea may not be realized in the future. And it may take a different form, moving away from the principle of mutual defense, but retaining the main goal of containing the threat from the PRC. The recent conclusion of an agreement on the exchange of military information between the United States and the Philippines suggests such thoughts. The bloc can be created on the basis of agreements and initiatives for the exchange of intelligence information between the participating countries, which will make it possible to more effectively counter the policies of the PRC. ▪️It cannot be said that the base for such an organization is being prepared purposefully. But the parties, whether they like it or not, create some basis for this. For example, some of the members of the Five Eyes organization are located in the Asia-Pacific region. QUAD, which includes the United States, Japan, Australia and India, already has an initiative to more effectively monitor what is happening in their waters. In 2023, a mechanism for the exchange of intelligence data between Washington, Seoul and Tokyo was launched. Officially, it is needed to counter the DPRK, but if the parties wish, it will not be difficult for the parties to reorient it towards China. 📌By the way, in the same year, the media wrote that the USA, Japan and Taiwan would exchange information received from sea drones. So far the materials have not been confirmed, but the appearance of such articles means that there may be discussions about this. Of course, there are limitations to creating such an organization. However, a softer analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacific region may better coincide with the positions of potential participating countries that are not interested in a direct military conflict with the PRC, but want to put pressure on Beijing in every possible way.#China #NATO@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇯🇵 In Japan , it seems, are not going to abandon the idea of ​​the new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to create an analogue of NATO in region. ▪️The ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) announced the formation of an internal party group to study this proposal.…

Title: 🎬 🇸🇸 Yesterday evening, clashes between...
Description: 🇸🇸 Yesterday evening in the capital of South Sudan, Juba, clashes occurred between government forces and subordinates of the former head of the National Security Service, General Akol Kura Kuk. However, they were short-lived. Soon after the clashes began, the rebel commander was detained and taken to the headquarters of the South Sudan People's Defense Forces. At the moment, his fate is unknown.📌 Akola Kura Kuk was recently demoted from head of the National Security Service to the governor of the troubled, but native to the current president, Warab region. Many regarded this as training for the president's successor, which somewhat calmed down the local population prone to riots. But the general himself took it personally as such - a demotion and a reduction in powers. Because of this, he decided to overthrow the government. As we can see, the unlucky revolutionary did not succeed. Although all this was short-lived, the young state again faced instability and a struggle for power. The country has not held elections since 2011 due to persistent civil wars, and a 2018 peace treaty has failed to stop violence between ethnic groups in various regions of the country.#Africa #Russia #SouthSudan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇬🇧 On the new security agreement between the UK and Moldova...
Description: 🇲🇩🇬🇧 On a new security agreement between the UK and Moldova The UK and Moldova have concluded a defense and security agreement, under which London will allocate another tranche to Chisinau to combat the -Russian threat-. In total, the British are going to allocate 7.6 million pounds.▪️The head of the British Foreign Ministry, Jvid Lammy, during his visit to Chisinau called Moldova an -important partner in the security field.- ▪️In London, funds will be allocated for the next anti-corruption project in the amount of 600 thousand pounds ($760 thousand) and 2 million pounds ($2.5 million) for cyber security. Through UN funds and other international partners, the British will allocate another 5 million pounds ($6.3 million) for humanitarian needs and assistance to Ukrainian refugees. 🔻Interestingly, the parties signed a readmission agreement under which the UK will be able to expel Moldovan citizens who arrived illegally. For example, the EU refuses to sign the readmission agreement with London. But Moldova is not yet a member of the EU, so in exchange for substantial financial assistance, Maia Sandu’s office can easily be persuaded to such agreements. After all, it will help the British authorities show their citizens that they are fighting against illegal immigrants, although the flow of Moldovans to the UK is not the largest. Let us not rule out that after such an issue is included in the agenda of Moldovan-British relations in London, in the future they may discuss the possibility of deporting not only Moldovan illegal immigrants to Moldova. At least, such negotiations with Armenia are already known.  🔻Moldova for Great Britain remains only a buffer zone in the conflict with Russia. It is the British who are credited with the desire to resolve the Transnistrian issue by force. Considering the recently revealed facts about the existence of an anti-Russian military lobby in the UK, which is promoting the escalation of the conflict with Russia to the so-called. For Ukraine, it is quite logical for the British to push through a military scenario for Moldova as well. At a minimum, for this purpose there are already financial injections into Sandu’s entourage and open work of British intelligence in the Moldovan direction. #Great Britain #Moldova #Transnistria #Russia@rybarSupport usTACCBritain announced the establishment of a defense partnership with Moldova. The parties also entered into a readmission agreement, thanks to which the UK will be able to return Moldovan citizens who arrived illegally to their homeland

Title: 🇦🇲🇮🇳 The Indian press is again revealing details of negotiati...
Description: 🇦🇲🇮🇳 The Indian press is again revealing details of negotiations on the purchase of weapons by Armenia from India. Now we are talking about the possible purchase of another 78 units of towed artillery systems ATAGS from Bharat Forge Limited. The Indian Defense Research Wing portal writes that the first batch of howitzers has already passed extensive tests in Armenia, including in the highlands and on the plains, showing accuracy over long distances. In India, they plan to adapt the new batch to the customer’s requests, including promising to create an interface in Armenian. ▪️As we noted, Armenian officials are angry that Indian media are covering details of defense deal negotiations. However, it is clear that this is an important marketing component for India, which is entering the global arms market.▪️ At the same time, details about Armenians testing new weapons will definitely be picked up by the Azerbaijani authorities and the media, who are looking for any reason to accuse Armenia of -revanchist- sentiments. In fact, the Armenian authorities do not have any revanchism, and the purchase of assorted equipment without a clear reform of the army is part of the strategy to distance themselves from Russia in all possible areas, including the military-industrial complex. #Armenia #India@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇲🇮🇳 The ongoing Indian series in Armenia is being followed by all analysts and observers interested in the Transcaucasus. And yesterday, the Bharat Electronics Limited company announced that the first battery of the Akash air defense system went to Armenia. About the conclusion of a contract for the supply...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 22, 2024 ▪️ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 22, 2024▪️ The main event of the past day was the use by the Russian Armed Forces of a medium-range ballistic missile - Oreshnik - (speed - Mach 10, 2.5-3 kilometers per second) and the ultimatum from the Supreme Commander, addressed to as much for Ukraine as for its Western masters, who openly allowed the Ukrainian Armed Forces to use ATACMS and Storm Shadow missiles against Bryansk and Kursk regions, respectively. The Yuzhmash plant in Dnepropetrovsk, which has been producing rocket technology since Soviet times, was hit. It is significant that shortly before the strike, Moscow warned Washington about the launch in order to avoid the accidental start of a nuclear war. From an information point of view, the event was out of the ordinary; Western politicians and the public reacted violently to the events.▪️ Heavy fighting continues in the Kursk region. The group of troops - North - advanced in the area of ​​the settlement with heavy fighting. Daryino and forest areas near the settlement. Malaya Loknya. 3 Ukrainian servicemen were captured. The total number of prisoners of the Ukrainian Armed Forces is 475 people. 2 counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using armored vehicles were repelled: in the village. Novoivanovka and in the area of ​​the settlement. Daryino.▪️ In the Kharkov direction, the next attacks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Liptsovsk direction were reflected, the enemy lost personnel and armored vehicles, and did not achieve success. Fighting continues in Volchansk near the area of ​​high-rise buildings.▪️ In the north of the Kurakhovsky direction, battles for the settlement are reported. Birch trees. To the south of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces established a foothold in the settlement. Farther, which cuts the defense pocket of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in two and creates a threat to the cascade of villages near the river. Dry Yaly. ▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the approaches to Razdolny and Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, advancing from Novodonetsky and Yasnaya Polyana. From Razdolny, our troops pose a threat of cutting off the enemy in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka from the main road to the north (Bogatyr settlement). Judging by the LBS diagram, the road is already under the fire control of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️ At night, at least 11 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region.▪️ The governor of the Kaluga region reported that at night on the outskirts of Kaluga, 6 UAVs were destroyed by air defense systems, and one UAV was destroyed in Dzerzhinsky area. ▪️ In the DPR, as a result of an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the settlement. Gorlovka (Tsentralno-Gorodskaya district) two 155 mm cluster shells injured 12 civilians. In Donetsk, as a result of a PFM mine explosion  -Lepestok- on the street. Yuzhnogornyatskaya, a man born in 1949 was injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on DnepropetrovskTonight, Russian troops carried out another attack on Ukrainian territories. The most important was the strike on the YuzhMash industrial enterprise in Dnepropetrovsk, during which intercontinental missiles could have been used...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Exacerbation of the situation in the Middle East: event...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of November 15 - 21, 2024▪️Pro-Iranian formations from Iraq again launched UAVs into Israel. The press service of the Israeli army reported on the interception of kamikaze drones in the southern part of the country. ▪️Later, pro-Iranian forces repeated the drone launch in Eilat. This time the drone was able to fly to the outskirts of the city. Where he was shot down by an Israeli air defense missile. It is noteworthy that one of the missiles lost its trajectory and fell within the boundaries of a populated area.▪️Even later, another launch of drones from Iraq took place in Eilat. For the third time during the period under review, the drone did not reach the city. Apparently, it was intercepted either over the territory of Jordan, or even fell in Iraq. Already on Wednesday, pro-Iranian groups launched drones, this time across the northern part of Israel. However, unlike Eilat, it was not possible to fly to the territory of the country.▪️The Yemeni Houthis once again announced drone strikes on Eilat. However, their UAVs did not reach their targets. There were no reports of any hits in the city or air defense operations during this time. They were probably intercepted by the American coalition.▪️The Yemeni Houthis reported an attack on the cargo ship Anadolu S, which had previously allegedly entered one of the Israeli ports. There is no footage yet that could not only confirm the damage to the ship, but also the fact of the attack itself.▪️The Israeli Air Force once again struck the western outskirts of Damascus. The target, according to statements from Syrian opposition sources, was an apartment where Hezbollah representatives were located. ▪️Israeli troops once again carried out an airstrike on the border crossing between Lebanon and Syria. This, like previous similar strikes, is associated with attempts to interrupt the supply of weapons to Hezbollah from Syria by other pro-Iranian formations.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 21, 2024. Russian troops for the first time used a hypersonic medium-range ballistic missile (MRBM) - Oreshnik - at military targets on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. The target was the production premises of the Yuzhmash military plant in Dnepropetrovsk. In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the approaches to Razdolny and Bolshaya Novoselka, advancing from Novodonetsky and Yasnaya Polyana. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Dalneye and expanded the zone of control in the fields to the east from the village.🔻Detailed analytical report on events in the zone Special military operation is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en)Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en)Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)#BolshayaNovoselka #digest #Dnepropetrovsk #report #map # Kurakhovo #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 Statement by White House representatives that the la...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 Statement by White House representatives that the Oreshnik launch will not have an impact on US policy regarding the so-called. Ukraine is quite expected - Washington would definitely not publicly declare the opposite simply for image reasons. If the Americans really want to change something in this matter (remember, there are no guarantees for this yet), then they can take advantage of the limited reserves of missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Forces. They say there are no prohibitions, but if you continue, we will announce the exhaustion of supply options due to production reasons. And we repeat again: even in this case, the threat of long-range weapons strikes deep into Russia will not disappear anywhere, and attacks by drones and Ukrainian-made missiles ( with a large number of Western components) will continue. The solution to this problem is still in the military plane.#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸🇷🇺The launch of a Russian missile will not have a restraining effect on Washington's policy towards Ukraine - White House. @usaperiodical

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: battles for Kurakhovo and the ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: battles for Kurakhovo and the liberation of a number of settlements situation to the end November 21, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue their successful advance in three areas in the Kurakhovo area, isolating the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in the city from three directions at once, increasingly squeezing ring of encirclement.▪️In the northern On the flank, Russian troops liberated most of Novodmitrovka and hold approximately half of Sontsovka, the capture of which will open the way to Starye Terny. At the same time, the fighters liberated Novoselidovka and the fields to the west of it: in the village itself, the movement of infantry of the Russian Armed Forces was recorded, and the fighting shifted to the south.▪️Near the northern shore of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, Russian units from the 5th Motorized Rifle Brigade liberated Novaya Ilyinka and started fighting for Berestki, moving along towards Starye Terny, from where the path to the exit opens to the rear of the Ukrainian positions in the center of Kurakhovo.▪️In Kurakhovo itself, Russian troops hoisted flags on the territory of the energy site of the Maryinskaya Distribution Zone near Zaporozhye Avenue directly in the city. 🔻According to unconfirmed information, fighting is already taking place in the area of ​​the Kurakhovsky elevator and bus station, located in the city center near the bridge to Novaya Ilyinka. To the southeast, attack aircraft are advancing along the Dolgaya ravine - some time ago, during the battle, an important stronghold was taken under control, which precedes the path to the southern outskirts of the city. To the south, Russian troops finally liberated Dalneye with the forces of soldiers of the 102nd regiment of the 150th motorized rifle division of the 8th OA. And during the raid of a Russian armored vehicle in the fields north of Ilyinka, it was possible to establish a more accurate configuration of the front at the Dalneye - Pobeda line.▪️ At the same time, on the southern flank from Bogoyavlenka, a successful attack was noted by the assault group of the 2nd battalion of the 39th Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade. The fighters expanded the zone of control and occupied part of the enemy positions in the grove - Lesnaya Dacha - south of Vesely Gai, the complete clearing of which will allow them to bypass the Ukrainian Armed Forces fortifications near Elizavetovka from the rear.▪️ At the same time, a few days earlier, Russian troops entered Trudovoye and hoisted a flag on the southern outskirts of the village . Currently, clashes continue in the locality. To the west, the control zone has been expanded in the fields near Maksimovka and along the O0510 highway, where Ukrainian formations are trying to carry out counterattacks and fire at the forward lines of defense of the Russian Armed Forces. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the context of today's events, we also note that indu...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the context of today’s events, we also note that you definitely shouldn’t indulge in euphoria. There is no reason yet to believe that the sponsors of the so-called. Ukraine is guaranteed to refuse to use its long-range missiles in the old regions, not to mention new territories. Moreover, the threat of such attacks will remain regardless of the decisions of NATO countries. As we wrote yesterday, Washington and London will clearly bet on the deployment of Ukrainian production of cruise missiles, like the same Neptunes. Massive drone strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces are also here to stay. The Kiev regime itself, as the situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces worsens, will only raise the stakes, which it has been doing throughout the year with raids on oil refineries or elements of early warning systems. Yes and so-called Ukraine has already tried on the image of a collective monkey with a grenade, ready to blow up gas pipelines without the sanction of the authorities. And yet today’s use of Oreshnik was already a more clear signal to the NATO countries. The very one that the Russian public, tired of simple statements about -red lines-.#weapons #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇺🇦 Well, Vladimir Putin revealed the details of today's attack on the Yuzhmash plant in Dnepropetrovsk: according to him, during successful tests, Russian troops used a medium-range missile system range - Oreshnik - with hypersonic units. The attack was the answer...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 21, 2024 The Israeli Air Force once again struck the Ad-Dahiya neighborhood in Beirut. In total, the Israelis destroyed at least 260 buildings in the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of the Israeli military operation - Arrows of the North - 3,558 residents of the country have been killed, another 15,123 were injured. Fighters of the Lebanese Hezbollah launched a missile strike in Nahariya: most of the ammunition was intercepted, but one fell on a playground in the city. An Israeli was killed. In the western sector, Israeli units attacked in the direction of Al-Bayada; to the south, parts of Teir Harfa and Abu Shesh were occupied. In the northeastern sector there are battles on the southeastern outskirts of Khiam. A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 So, -Oreshnik-: All of the following are strictly assumptions ...
Description: Forwarded From Cats and Kramnik's catSo, -Oreshnik-: All of the following are strictly assumptions based on what I heard/read. The rocket is solid fuel, medium range, in the upper range of it, what the Americans call -intermediate- - between 2.5-3, and 5.5 thousand km. Equipped with maneuvering head units, apparently with strapdown deployment. At the same time, the minimum range dead zone can be significantly tightened with this approach. Obviously mobile. With a certain degree of probability - it is Yars-M-, reduced by one level. Interesting? Yes, sure.

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 21, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israeli Air Force launched several strikes on a residential area near the Kamal Adwan hospital in the Jabaliya area, killing 66 people and injuring more than 100. In response, Palestinian forces fired on Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) positions in the Netzarim corridor, and also launched a rocket at Kerem Shalom. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces arrested at least 12 Palestinians. In total, since October 7, 2023, the total number of detainees is more than 11,700 people. In the Red Sea region, fighters of the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - attacked an unidentified merchant ship southwest of the city of Aden, but without details.🔻Detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone available on our private channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Well, Vladimir Putin revealed the details of today's ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Well, Vladimir Putin revealed the details of today’s attack on the Yuzhmash plant in Dnepropetrovsk: according to him, during successful tests, Russian troops used a medium-range missile system - Oreshek - with hypersonic units. The attack was a response to US plans for the production of medium- and shorter-range missiles at the facility. The President also stated that in the event of an escalation, Russia will respond decisively and in a mirror manner, and targets for destruction will be selected depending on threats to the country’s security. It is characteristic that previously there was no information about Oreshnik in open sources, and even many specialized experts today about heard it for the first time. This means that the complex was developed without understatement in the strictest secrecy.❗️Vladimir Putin also directly stated that Russia has the right to use weapons against military facilities of those countries that give permission to use their long-range weapons to strike Russian territory. This wording is unambiguous, and the message to sponsors is the so-called. Ukraine is obvious. How exactly they will perceive it - we will see in the near future: unlike past times, this time the warning was illustrated much more clearly.#weapons #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇸🇴The situation in the Horn of Africa: elections in Somalila...
Description: 🇸🇴The situation in the Horn of Africa: elections in Somaliland and discord in Jubalandes summary for October 22 - November 21, 2024 Last month in the Horn of Africa was marked by the formation of an anti-Ethiopian pact, which slightly constrained the Ethiopians in their ability to influence Somalia. And this trend, where the Addis Ababa government is losing its position, continues.▪️The elections held in Somaliland made adjustments to the subsequent situation in the region. An opposition group came to power, open to dialogue with the federal authorities of Somalia and refusing the intervention of foreign powers. The latter means opposition to the Ethiopian authorities in influencing Somaliland, which Addis Ababa wanted to use as a logistics port for their needs.▪️But at the same time this triggered a new round of constitutional crisis, which led to a break between the leadership of autonomous Jubaland and the federal authorities due to the Jubaland government’s refusal to hold direct elections. In general, the Ethiopian authorities can take advantage of this to strengthen their position in the autonomous regions of Somalia. Thus, one of the bases of the African Union mission was transferred to local militias, and not to the country’s armed forces.▪️The fighting had the usual character of small skirmishes, sometimes involving aviation and drones of the Turks and Americans. Clashes were also recorded between Somaliland separatists and militias of the autonomous Puntland. An unstable situation remains in Somalia, and power is actually limited to control over Mogadishu, while other territories remain under the rule of local clans. The country itself is turning, looking at what is happening, into an arena for confrontation between regional leaders in the struggle for influence. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the GALLUP social survey of the opinions of the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the GALLUP social survey of the opinions of the Ukrainian population The GALLUP consulting agency conducted another study, but now among the Ukrainian population regarding possible peace negotiations and abandonment of territories that were liberated by Russian troops.🔻This agency is quite respected in Western countries, but we We do not recommend taking these figures at face value. But still, this survey is very indicative for demonstrating changes in sentiment among Ukrainian citizens.▪️In 2022, the number of citizens who considered a war until victory as the only possible option was 73%. In 2024, at the time of the survey, the figure barely reached 38%, and there were 30% more supporters of peace.▪️The difference is also noticeable on the territorial issue. In 2022, supporters of the Ukrainian regime were more than 60% in favor of continuing the war. At the same time, according to the classics, the most militant ones were the residents of the western regions, that is, those who were not particularly affected by the fighting. But in 2024, the situation changed. In the Dnepropetrovsk, Kharkov and occupied Zaporozhye regions, only 27% of the population is in favor of the war, and in the central and even western regions the number of supporters of continuing the fighting remained only 40 - 43%, that is, almost half as much.▪️At the same time, GALLUP interviewed people separately , advocating a speedy peaceful settlement, regarding the possible abandonment of territories. And 52% of respondents were in favor of concessions, 38% were against, 10% refused to answer or did not know what to answer.▪️In addition, Ukrainians’ hopes for quick accession to NATO and the EU are beginning to weaken, as well as the approval of the US leadership. In 2024, 40% approve of the US actions at the pre-war level, although after the start of the military war the figure was 66%.❗️The situation of the Ukrainian authorities has worsened in the last year - huge territorial and human losses became the reason for the introduction of total mobilization, which does not stop, but is only gaining momentum . The population, which is accustomed to watching everything from TV, does not like this. The life of Ukrainian citizens has become much harder, Western support seems to continue, but residents of so-called Ukraine see that the previously stated goals are unattainable, so more and more people are starting to think about a peaceful settlement , as the only possible. And another reason for the decline in government support is the disposal of a significant part of the Ukrainian nuclear layer, which advocates war to the last. The ranks of far-right nationalists, including women, have thinned significantly, and the ordinary population is already quite tired of the fighting. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport us
Forwarded From Informant

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremevsky direction: liberation of Rovnopol and a bre...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: liberation of Rovnopol and a breakthrough to Bolshaya Novoselka from the east the situation as of 17:00 November 2024 Russian troops continue to consistently cut off the enemy’s penetration in the Vremyevsky direction, attacking in the direction of Bolshaya Novoselka from several flanks at once. The offensive began at the end of last week and now we can already talk about the results. ▪️Southwest of the key settlement in the area, Russian troops liberated Rovnopol. In the village, soldiers of the 5th Guards Army recently hoisted the Russian flag. The fighting in this sector has continued for the last week, but now the Russian Armed Forces have finally gained a foothold in Rovnopol. In Novodarovka, fighting continues in the center of the village. To the east in Makarovka, there remains a focal presence of scattered enemy detachments on the northern outskirts, but there is no talk of any successful counterattacks, much less control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the populated area.▪️From Yasnaya Polyana and Shakhterskoye, a very significant advance was noted towards Razdolnoye. Several forest belts, as well as strongholds, came under the control of Russian troops. In fact, now units of the 40th Infantry Brigade and the 5th Tank Brigade managed to reach the outskirts of Razdolnoye, and the 139th Infantry Brigade managed to bypass the settlement from the north from the side of the Nalivach and Shulicha gullies, almost reaching the T-05-18 highway. Some of the strongholds to the southeast were taken without any problems, and at some the Ukrainian formations are desperately resisting.▪️South of Razdolny, according to available data, in some areas it was possible to move up to five and a half kilometers to the west south of the Maltabar gully. The Russian Armed Forces were able to reach almost the outskirts of Bolshaya Novoselka, advancing along the O0510 road. It is between the Kashlagach River and the highway that the greatest advance of Russian troops is recorded. In the interval between the Kashlagach and Shaitanka rivers, the enemy was also knocked out of several forest belts. South of Shaitanka, west of Novodonetskoye, there are also noticeable successes, where units of the 37th Motorized Rifle Brigade are advancing: the advance was about five kilometers in the direction of Blagodatnoye. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot. High resolution mapEnglish version#Timepiece #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybar Support us

Title: 🇫🇷🌾 In France, protests by farmers against the EU agreement co...
Description: 🇫🇷🌾 In France, protests by farmers against the EU agreement with the MERCOSUR countries on the removal of customs duties on their agricultural products continue for the fifth day. The protests began on Sunday at the call of the main agricultural trade union FNSEA.🔻Protests related to the discussion of a free trade agreement between the EU and MERCOSUR are timed to coincide with Macron’s visit to Argentina and the G20 summit in Brazil, but have every chance of continuing after events. On Sunday, in unison with their German colleagues, French business executives blocked the border in Strasbourg - the Kehl Bridge. Ports in Le Havre, Rouen and Bordeaux are also blocked. A march of farmers to Brussels is planned for Monday. 🔻The protesters represent different interests: ▪️The main trade union of farmers, FNSEA, represents large farmers and the agro-industrial complex, who do not need competition in the form of cheaper, more massive products from Latin America and stuffed with pesticides banned in the EU. Of the 178 pesticides used in Brazil, 138 are banned in France, the French Corn Society proved in March. However, it is the difference in phytosanitary standards that makes these products much cheaper, and everyone understands that, due to inflation, the French will buy them. ▪️The more conservative and radical trade union Coordination Rurale, well represented in southwestern France, including near the city of Agen, represents small and medium-sized livestock farms that are already losing money due to the import of Ukrainian agricultural products into the EU, including chicken meat. Any duty-free quotas from Latin America - and now we are talking about 98,000 tons of beef, 25,000 tons of pork and 160,000 tons of chicken - would be a death sentence. In recent days, farmers have marched on tractors in the regional centers of southwestern France: Oche, Perigueux, Limoges, Bordeaux, Pau, Nimes, Rodez, Guere, and also reminded of themselves in the middle cities of Brittany, and the cities of the northeast of the country. In rural areas, farmers disable road cameras - however, since 2013, they have suffered at every mass protest. And in the suburb of Bordeaux - Pessac - brave suppliers of agricultural products break into councils, confiscate EU flags and burn them.❗️So far, it seems, there is a simple warm-up with symbolic actions, but they are overlaid with general dissatisfaction with the policies pursued to please the world transnational elites, the plight of farmers and winemakers after a rainy summer and political instability in France after parliamentary early elections at the end of June.🔻The French themselves do not support the protests of the farmers, but they do not interfere either. According to polls, 81% of the local population supports the rallies, and 75% are opposed to signing an agreement with MERCOSUR in principle. But most EU governments are in favor of the initiative, including industrialists in Germany and Spain, where they are looking to Latin American markets as a salvation from the EU's own recession. Poland (where the agrarians are also strong) and Italy may join France in the protest front against the treaty. #France@rybar together with @fifthrepublicSupport usTelegramFifth Republic

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: breakthrough of the Ukra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: breakthrough of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense to the west of Petropavlovka and assault on Kupyansksituation as of 17:00 on November 21, 2024. The Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction in the past weeks was marked by an intensification of hostilities and a breakthrough of Russian troops into Kupyansk itself. While fighting is going on in the city in the eastern part, to the south the Russian Armed Forces are gradually pushing through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo. ▪️In mid-November, Russian troops broke through the defenses of Ukrainian formations northwest of Petropavlovka. The offensive began during the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units, which did not allow them to organize defense and quickly transfer reserves due to a shortage of manpower. 🔻As a result of a successful attack, the entire forest area and the Kulagovo railway station came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, which Russian attack aircraft subsequently relied on to advance to Kupyansk. After the liberation of the station territory, the Russian Armed Forces began an offensive along the railway track, taking advantage of the elevation changes and disorganization of the enemy. Soon, advanced armored groups entered the northeastern outskirts of Kupyansk and gained a foothold in the private sector. ❗️After this, one of the main goals of the Russian units became the territory of the Kupyansky feed mill, which is one of the key strongholds of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the eastern part of the city. Its release will allow the Russian Armed Forces to take under fire control the section of the N-26 highway from Kupyansk to Petropavlovka, while the object itself is protected from enemy counterattacks from the latter by an impassable peat bog. In parallel with this, the attack aircraft began to advance towards the dairy plant and sugar factory, without encountering significant resistance. Fighting broke out over the territory of both enterprises, while the enemy transferred reserve units to the site. According to available data, the Ukrainian Armed Forces managed to partially stabilize the situation and at the moment neither side has stable control over the industrial zone. ❗️It is currently difficult to determine the exact configuration of the front in the city and its surroundings. The enemy, trying to reduce the media effect of the breakthrough of the Russian Armed Forces in Kupyansk, publishes footage of objective control with a serious delay. Russian units have also so far refrained from covering the fighting in the city, focusing on the success of the operation. ▪️To the south there are battles on the outskirts of Glushkovka. Earlier, the RF Armed Forces managed to dislodge the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the territory of the Kolesnikovka station in the forest and advance north, reaching the outskirts of the village both along the left bank of Oskol and east of Kolesnikovka. Success in this sector will allow Russian troops to form a southern claw encirclement of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the Petropavlovka-Novoosinovo sector, aimed at reaching Kupyansk-Uzlovoy, which is regularly subject to air raids by the Russian Aerospace Forces. Over the past month, the Russian Armed Forces have carried out several successful local attacks south of Berestovoe. During one of them, a Russian armored group attacked the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the north and landed troops that drove the enemy out of the strong point. Tactical successes were also noted in the Stelmakhovka area - several forest belts to the west of the village came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. 🔻Probably, the main efforts of the Russian command on the southern flank of the Kupyansk-Svatovsky direction are aimed at expanding the wedge driven into the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kruglyakovka area. In the long term, it is also possible to create the preconditions for a future attack on Borovaya, another important enemy logistics hub on the left bank of the Oskol Reservoir. Simultaneously with this united front, work is also underway in the Liman direction, where the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in the Pervomaisky area, control over which is also important for the breakthrough to Borovaya. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the ICC arrest warrant for Netanyahu and Galan...
Description: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the ICC arrest warrant for Netanyahu and Galant Less than an hour ago, the International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for the Prime Minister and former Minister of Defense of Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Galant, for war crimes committed in the Gaza Strip.🔻Since the information is confirmed by Israeli media, it can be stated that the ultra-Orthodox government of Israel with acceleration drove into the wall. In fact, this is a continuation of the confrontation, the next episode of which was the investigation against ICC Prosecutor General Karim Khan, probably initiated by supporters of the current Israeli leadership. Of course, no one will arrest Netanyahu and Galant (as well as our President Vladimir Putin). This is rather a slap in the face and a serious diplomatic blow to the reputation of the ultra-Orthodox.📌 But the ultra-Orthodox themselves and also their supporters (for example, like Chabadniks, many of whom are first-rank officials in the so-called Ukraine) will have cause for great concern. After all, for them this does not mean anything good, at least in the short term. Everything that happened is similar to the demobilization chord of those who stand behind Biden. In recent weeks, the US authorities have been doing everything that will undoubtedly affect Donald Trump after his inauguration. Granting permission to Ukrainian formations, new packages of military assistance - this was done to complicate the resolution of the conflict. Donald Trump himself has close family ties with the ultra-Orthodox, and the order against Netanyahu and Galant will also affect Trump. And this, in turn, will have an impact on the Ukrainian elite, which will be more difficult for Trump to support.❗️In the short term, the ultra-Orthodox in Israel will begin to try on the image of victims of anti-Semitism, simultaneously mobilizing everyone they can, supposedly to resist hostile pressure from the outside. That is, continue to pursue an aggressive policy against its neighbors.#Israel #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport uswww.news1.co.ilבית הדין הפלילי בהאג הוציא צווי מעצר Please contact us, * Please: Please contact us חיילים

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Another group from the Idlib terrarium reminded...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Another group from the Idlib terrarium reminded itself: the terrorist group Katiba al-Tawhid wal-Jihad (KTD, operating under Hayat Tahrir al-Sham) published footage of its activities in Syria. The main feature of the video was that militants began using drones to attack government forces, and the narrator particularly noted the influence of Ukrainian forces on new combat tactics using drones. According to a member of the KTD (Uzbek, judging by the language), drones have become an effective tool that is much cheaper than missiles or other weapons , but they can strike at concentrations of people, equipment and firing points, as they showed in the published footage.🔻The news that immediately comes to mind is that units of the Ukrainian The GUR trained militants in Idlib to assemble, modernize and use drones against the Russian Armed Forces and the Syrian Arab Republic. Before the appearance of this information, terrorists were not observed in the methodical use of these technologies. There were isolated episodes, but not so often. The Uzbek terrorist KTD did not directly say who trained them, but the facts in the form of hints about the success of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in this direction speak for themselves. All this once again demonstrates the influence of the special operation on the course of armed conflicts. Interest in unmanned technologies has increased due to the low cost of materials and high possibilities for their use, which is expressed not only in Syria, but also in other regions such as Africa or Myanmar.#Russia #Syria #terrorism #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇪🇸 About migrant flows to the Canaries Exacerbation of the...
Description: 🌍🇪🇸 About migrant flows to the Canary Islands The aggravation of the internal political situation in northeast Africa has caused significant changes in the routes of migration flows. In the past few years, African refugees have chosen routes not through Libya, but through the Comoros Islands, which belong to Spain. Numerous migrants from Gambia, Senegal, Mauritania and other West African countries use the services of smugglers to cross the sea. The relative cheapness and geographical accessibility attract Africans who have little to lose. Moreover, various Western NGOs calmly distribute money, which is just enough to transport them to Europe.❗However, this route is the most dangerous. According to Western analysts, approximately 95% of all fatal migration flights occur in the Atlantic. At the same time, the number of migrants does not decrease, but rather increases. So, since 2023, the number of arrivals to the Canary Islands has increased by more than 1000%.🔻This issue raises concerns in the EU. The Spanish authorities clearly do not want to see tens of thousands of illegal migrants on their territory, especially in the tourist area, which could create security problems and affect the tourist flows that bring in a lot of money. Therefore, more than 200 million euros were allocated from Europe to Mauritania to fight illegal immigrants. And the Spanish fleet participates in joint patrols with their Senegalese and Mauritanian counterparts. And, of course, this does not bring any results while there are millions of Africans living in poverty and dreaming of moving to Europe. And the financing of social programs by various NGOs only encourages people to spend the money they receive on a -new life-.High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #migration@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on Dnepropetrovsk Tonight, Russ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the ICBM strike on Dnepropetrovsk Tonight, Russian troops carried out another attack on Ukrainian territories. The most important was the strike on the YuzhMash industrial enterprise in Dnepropetrovsk, during which an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) could have been used. According to some signs, an ICBM could actually be used for this (this can be seen from the characteristic multiple warheads), which is the first successful combat use of this type of weapon in the history of military conflicts. The combat units were non-nuclear. Although there is talk on the Internet about the RS-26 Rubezh, the type of missile is not reliably known. Ukrainian formations were unable to shoot down the ICBMs, as evidenced by the arrival footage.❗️This can be called a clear signal to the sponsors of so-called Ukraine (especially on the anniversary of the Maidan) against the backdrop of Western permission to use long-range missiles. Time will tell how much they understood it. But today’s strike is truly a non-trivial move, since nothing like this has happened before. And there is reason to believe that this is not the last such application.#Dnepropetrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇫🇩🇪 Ambassador of the former Afghan government to Germany Ya...
Description: 🇦🇫🇩🇪 The Ambassador of the former Afghan government to Germany, Yama Yari, and the Consul General in Bonn, Lutfullah Sadat, announced their resignation, noting that they did so under pressure from the German authorities. According to them, they were given an ultimatum: to surrender their powers or establish contacts with the authorities of the Islamic Emirate. Recently, many of this kind of pressure on the ambassadors of the now defunct republic has intensified. Many countries began to demand similar actions from them. In July, the Taliban announced that they no longer recognize the diplomatic missions created by the former government of Afghanistan and the passports, visas and other documents they issued. It is logical that it was in Germany that they took drastic measures: the Germans are trying to resolve the issue of deportation of Afghan refugees. This issue was already discussed during the chancellor's visit to Central Asia two months ago. And taking into account how the migration situation in Europe and Germany, in particular, has worsened, the new trends are quite understandable. The funny paradox is that people who fled the war with the Taliban indirectly and without their desire help the new Afghan authorities resolve the issue of their legitimization at the international level arena. And the Germans, quite possibly, will give impetus to other European states to do the same. But, looking at these actions of Germany, theses about the growing danger of the Islamic State in Afghanistan look even more artificial. In Europe, the Taliban are accused of allegedly not coping with the Islamic State, but at the same time they themselves are taking steps towards recognition of the Islamic Emirate as the legitimate government in the country. #Afghanistan #Germany@rybarSupport usfergana.mediaGerman authorities forced the Ambassador of Afghanistan and the Consul General in Bonn to leave resign

Title: 🇷🇺🇹🇲🇺🇿🇰🇬 About the transport corridor from Russia to Kyrg...
Description: 🇷🇺🇹🇲🇺🇿🇰🇬 About the transport corridor from Russia to Kyrgyzstan A number of Central Asian media published articles about the creation of a route that would connect Russia and Kyrgyzstan through the Caspian Sea, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan, bypassing Kazakhstan. They are planning this because of difficulties crossing the Kazakh-Kyrgyz border, which arise with enviable regularity. In fact, in Astana, they use their geographic location in this way to fight competitors in favor of their carriers, which causes damage to other sectors of the Kyrgyz (and not only) economy. This is not the first time this corridor project has been talked about. Last summer, Governor Igor Babushkin announced the participation of Astrakhan shipping companies in it. Later, in November 2023, a memorandum of understanding was signed at the first SCO transport forum in Tashkent. For the Kyrgyz economy, as well as for the Russian one, the presence of alternative routes (and multimodal) is important, since there must be diversification in any area. The position of Kazakhstan, which increasingly declares and defends the interests of Western countries, makes the search for new ways even more urgent. #Russia #Kyrgyzstan #Turkmenistan #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usOrient ExpressKyrgyzstan and Russia are building a new transport corridor, leaving Kazakhstan | Main topic: Kyrgyzstan and Russia are building a new transport corridor, moving away from Kazakhstan. The latest news from the East on Orient Express 24.

Title: 🇹🇷 The Turks continue to sell their drones to Africa. Here are ...
Description: 🇹🇷 The Turks continue to sell their drones to Africa. The Moroccan armed forces are purchasing the Akinci drone, which has already proven itself on the Dark Continent, and the Turkish Armed Forces themselves are actively using them against the Kurds in Iraq. For Morocco, this is not the first Turkish drone - they have already used the Bayraktar TB2 in operations against Western Saharawi rebels. Not to say that it is very effective, since sometimes their attacks led to the death of civilians and gold miners in Mauritania. In addition, Turkish companies are interested in exporting their training aircraft to Egypt. The Hürjet presented by TAI is a cheaper analogue of Western products for air force modernization, and according to plans it can be used as a light attack aircraft. But here, too, the nuance is that these are promising aircraft that have not even been put into production yet, and their real capabilities are unknown. So far, only two prototypes have been built, which should replace the American training T-38. In general, the fact that Ankara is trying to sell its products to unstable markets is a long-established trend. And they have success. Due to their low cost and the lack of dense air defense in the countries of the region, these drones are a formidable weapon against rebels and militants.#Africa #UAVs #Egypt #Morocco #Turkey@rybarSupport usMilitary AfricaMorocco acquiring Akinci drone from TurkeyMorocco is reportedly in talks to acquire Turkish Bayraktar Akinci drones. Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 On the appointment of the head of the Ministry of Intern...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 About the appointment of the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Armenia In Armenia, after a wave of resignations in the government, there was an eloquent appointment of another Western protégé to one of the key positions. Thus, Arpine Sargsyan, who previously served as deputy minister, became the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Sarkissian works closely with the US Embassy in Armenia and Ambassador Christina Quinn, who plays an important role in Armenian political life. It was Sargsyan, in the status of deputy minister, who represented the Armenian Ministry of Internal Affairs to American officials, reporting on the progress of reforms in the law enforcement sphere and the development of new programs under the auspices of the State Department and the US FBI.❗️As we wrote, in the United States they are putting Armenian security forces under the control. And it is obvious that the main motive of the Americans is not related to the real fight against crime. Moreover, in recent years, violence and crime in Armenia, on the contrary, have increased. It is much more important for Washington to place its protégés in responsible positions in the field of state security in order to bring it completely under its control. #Armenia #USA@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇲 About resignations in the government of ArmeniaThere is a wave of resignations of high-ranking officials in Armenia. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 20, 2024. Russian troops attacked the Impulse plant in Shostka in the Sumy region, causing a powerful detonation at the facility. Ukrainian formations hit a facility in Maryino in the Kursk region with Storm Shadow cruise missiles. In the Kursk direction, Russian fighters hit another M1A1SA Abrams tank in the Sudzhansky district, and also completed clearing positions in the Olgovskaya Grove area in the Korenevsky district. In the Pokrovsky direction, attack aircraft are fighting in the eastern on the outskirts of Petrovka, advancing towards Pokrovsk along the railway. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Novoselidovki, are fighting in Sontsevka, and have also made significant progress within the borders of Kurakhovo.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en)#digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine #Shostka@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 20, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the operation of Israeli troops continues, several air strikes were carried out on Jabaliya and nearby areas. Israeli drone activity has also been observed in the air. In the central and southern parts of the enclave, the situation has not undergone significant changes. Israeli aircraft carried out several strikes on the outskirts of Rafah, Al-Mawasi, as well as Nuseirat. Police operations continue in the West Bank. The largest clashes took place in Jenin and several nearby towns, where local Palestinian factions reported attacks and ambushes on Israeli security forces. The Islamic Resistance in Iraq announced the launch of several drones in northern Israel. Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 20, 2024 The Israeli offensive continues in the western sector. In the central sector, the situation is relatively calmer, with only a few IDF air and artillery strikes reported. In the northeastern sector, IDF units are trying to advance from Markaba. In response, Hezbollah units strike at concentrations of Israeli troops. In the sector north of the Golan Heights, the Israeli offensive began in the direction of Kafr Shuba and Shebaa, but its details at the moment remain unknown - there is only information about exchanges of fire. Israeli aircraft again inflicted several attacks on Syria, hitting targets in and around Palmyra. According to official reports, 36 people were killed and another 50 were injured.
