Title: 🖼 🇮🇶🇹🇷🏴 About the progress of the Turkish operation in Iraq...
Description: 🇮🇶🇹🇷🏴 About the progress of the Turkish operation in Iraq After the terrorist attack in Turkey, everyone expected the start of the ground phase of the Turkish Armed Forces against the Kurdish forces, as indicated by loud statements from the top leadership of the republic. But the Turks, after carrying out several massive attacks, calmed down. Whether this was due to the elections in the United States or the diplomatic efforts of the Iraqi authorities, who do not want another chaos in their country, is difficult to say now, but in fact the activity of Turkish troops has really decreased.🔻Over the past week 10 flights of F-16C/D fighters and 11 flights of drones - Akinji - were noted in northern Iraq. A total of 16 strikes were carried out, of which two were carried out by artillery units of the Turkish ground forces.▪️The targets chosen for the strikes remained unchanged. The Turks attacked PKK positions hidden in the mountainous terrain, firing points, various warehouses and cars with Kurds from the PKK (as they stated in press releases from the Ministry of Defense).▪️The problem is that this information cannot be verified. We saw with our own eyes how Akynci and Bayraktar work, and it is difficult to say for sure in the case of Iraq. The Kurds are very well camouflaged, and in most cases the Turks strike at random.❗️The activity of the Turkish Armed Forces over the past week can be considered standard daily, that is, on average, on an unremarkable day, a couple of fighters and two drones fly for target designation and strikes (-Bayraktary- and -Anki - are not taken into account, since there are a lot of them flying). At first glance, there is nothing remarkable about this, but, tracking the statistics flights of aviation and drones, you can see in advance the preparations of the Turkish side for intensification, which will be visible in the increase in flights and strikes on the occupied territory. Currently, there is a lull in this direction (as well as in Syria), but the Turks will not give up what they want just like that. And the Erdogan administration is also keeping silent for now, as if waiting for some favorable moment. High resolution mapEnglish version#Iraq #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the Australian -Abrams- for the Armed Force...
Description: 🇦🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 About the Australian -Abrams- for the VSUArchangel Spetsnaz writes that in connection with the delivery by the Americans of the first batch of M1A2 SEPv3 Abrams tanks to Australia, we should expect in the coming weeks the delivery of outdated models -Abrams-, which were in service with the Australians, for the needs Armed Forces of Ukraine.📌 Even with the official announcement of the transfer of this or that equipment, the Americans may not actually give up something. This was the example of many countries - Taiwan alone suffered from this many times. Moreover, before that, the new Abrams were shown by the Australians in single quantities at an exhibition in mid-October, but there were no further facts of their receipt.❗️ Having studied the flights of transport aviation of the Australian Air Force , we noted that throughout November, four or five C-17 heavy transport aircraft made more than one flight to the United States. You can’t say for sure why, but everything coincides with the statements of the Australian authorities about the receipt of the first batch. Therefore, the delivery of tanks, at least some part, most likely took place. As for the so-called Ukraine, whose authorities have been begging these tanks from Australia for more than a year, progress is noticeable in this direction. Particular activity of heavy cargo aircraft was also noted in the area of ​​​​the city of Perth, a port on the western coast of the continent, which is used for transportation from Australia to the Middle East and Europe. It is much more convenient to send dozens of units of heavy armored vehicles by sea than by air. At the same time, on October 28, one of the Australian C-17s made a long flight from Amberley airbase to Rzeszow, Poland, with a stop in the Middle East. Rzeszow is a transit point where Western countries unload weapons and equipment transported for the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. And this flight looks very interesting in the context of statements by the Australian leadership. If we add to this the permission to strike with long-range missiles and the obvious preparation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces for a counterattack, then tanks are what the Ukrainian formations lack, so their transfer is either already underway or will take place in the near future. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇰🇵🇰🇷 News is coming from North Korea about the IV meeting ...
Description: Forwarded From Awakening Dragon 🐲🇰🇵🇰🇷 News is coming from North Korea about the IV meeting of commanders and political instructors of the battalions of the Korean People's Army. North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, in his speech during the event, talked about American support for Ukraine, the situation on the Korean Peninsula, and the creation of an analogue of NATO in the region. In addition, Kim called for every effort to be made to improve preparations for war. In his opinion, every day represents a precious opportunity for this. 🔻After reading this, we can conclude that military operations on the Korean Peninsula will begin in the near future. However, it is important to understand what kind of war North Korea is preparing for. In our opinion, we are talking specifically about a defensive scenario. This is indicated by the construction of defense structures that began this year on almost all parts of the border with South Korea, the recent destruction of roads and railway lines connecting the two countries, as well as the conclusion of an agreement with Russia that includes an article on providing assistance in the event of an attack. . ▪️The last point appears to reduce the likelihood of any military action on the peninsula, because the treaty is aimed at containing the threat from the emerging alliance of the United States, South Korea and Japan. In general, the outbreak of a major conflict in the region now does not seem to be a very realistic scenario. Especially when it comes to an attack on South Korea by the DPRK. Therefore, the warlike rhetoric of both sides should be divided into two. @awaken_dragonTelegramTwo majors🇰🇵 November 18, KCNA: Kim Jong-un accused the United States and South Korea of ​​creating the most tense situation in history on the Korean Peninsula. In Pyongyang (North Korea) on November 14-15, for the first time in 10 years, the fourth meeting of commanders and political instructors was held...

Title: 🔁🖼 ❗️RT analysis: which ATACMS missiles are the most dangerous ...
Description: Forwarded From RT in Russian❗️RT analysis: which ATACMS missiles are the most dangerous and how many of them the US has Among the modifications of these missiles, two types stand out.▫️The first is the MGM-140B ATACMS Block 1A with a cassette warhead. ▫️The second is MGM-168A ATACMS Block 1A (QRU) with a high-explosive fragmentation part. Both versions have a launch range of up to 300 km and are dangerous for both military and industrial facilities. Since the 1980s, about 3.5 thousand ATACMS missiles of all modifications have been produced in the United States. Of this amount, about 600-700 units have already been used in combat, including 414 missiles during operations in Iraq in 2003. As of 2024, the United States, according to various estimates, may have about 2 thousand missiles in stock, including both new manufactured missiles and refurbished old ones. However, part of this supply may be unavailable due to expiration or other factors. It is known that a key feature of all modifications of ATACMS missiles is high-speed dive from the upper layers of the stratosphere at a speed of about 1100-850 m/s at angles greater than 75-80°. In some cases, such trajectories extend beyond the vertical sectors of view of the guidance radars of the S-400 and S-300V4 complexes. And therefore, an important part of the preparation for repelling an ATACMS attack will be the distribution of individual anti-aircraft missile divisions and regiments in a missile-hazardous direction for a sufficient level of separation. It is also worth noting that the S-350 -Vityaz- medium- and long-range air defense systems have high potential in the fight against ATACMS. the missiles of which will be able to shoot down ATACMS even in the event of anti-missile maneuvers due to the presence of a system of gas-dynamic rudders. It is known that this system does a good job of repelling HIMARS strikes in the Donetsk direction.🟩 Subscribe | Send news | Read analytics

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: battles west of Sel...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: battles west of Selidovo and near Novogrodovkasituation as of 15:00 November 18, 2024 Russian troops are successfully advancing in the Pokrovskoe direction on several sectors of the front. Despite the fact that on the northern flank on the approaches to Mirnograd the activity of the Russian Armed Forces has decreased slightly, to the west of Selidovo Russian troops continue to expand the zone of control on the flanks near the city.▪️On the northern front, attacks are recorded at the Grodovka-Nikolaevka line, where, according to the results of several attacks Over the past weeks, Russian troops have been able to occupy several enemy strongholds. Enemy aviation activity is noted, using guided bombs to strike positions of the Russian Armed Forces. On the northern approaches to Novogrodovka there are oncoming battles. The enemy regularly counterattacks based on Mirnograd and defensive lines in the area of ​​the railway in the direction of mine No. 3 -Novogrodovskaya-. One of the fortified areas north of Novogrodovka and west of Krutoy Yar is currently, apparently, a contested territory in which UAV operators of both sides are operating with varying success.▪️At the Grigorovka-Novogrodovka line, a significant expansion of the zone of control of Russian troops is also recorded. Vast fields to the northeast and southwest of the M-30 highway have been cleared of the enemy. In addition, attack aircraft occupied several strongholds of Ukrainian formations in the area. The information is confirmed both by information from the field and by footage published on the Internet.▪️In Petrovka, meanwhile, several units of armored vehicles and vehicles of Ukrainian formations were destroyed, which with enviable consistency Ukrainian commanders send along the same targeted route along forest belts near the railway. In Grigorovka, on the western outskirts, the Russian flag was raised by soldiers from the 1437 motorized rifle regiment of the Alexandria Brigade.❗️In addition, the control zone in the vicinity of Novoalekseevka was significantly expanded. Russian attack aircraft reached the outskirts of Yuryevka, where fighting began. By now, the settlement has most likely been taken: the control of the Russian Armed Forces over half of the village is reliably known. In the near future, you should expect information about the liberation of the settlement. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map # Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇮🇷🇷🇺 Yesterday, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said ...
Description: 🇦🇿🇮🇷🇷🇺 Yesterday, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said that Russia, Iran and Azerbaijan are discussing the construction of a railway from Azerbaijan to the port of Bandar Abbas on the shores of the Persian Gulf. The construction of the Rasht-Astara branch is currently underway, in addition to which Russian companies want to invest in construction of a road with Russian standard gauge from Parsabad to Bandar Abbas.📌 Hypothetically, this project looks very, very promising, since it will significantly reduce both the time and costs of logistics from both Russia and Iran. Now trade goes through the Caspian Sea and periodically by air, but this cannot be compared with the railway in terms of volume and speed. Plus, Russia will have access to the Persian Gulf and India, with which there is also an active trade in goods. There are many nuances that need to be overcome, for example, the electrification of the railway track, which will take a lot of time. But upon completion of the construction of the branch from Astara, the situation will be significantly easier.❗️The long-term benefits from this project exceed the possible costs, since when the designated goals are achieved, everyone will benefit - Russia and Iran as the main operators, and Azerbaijan as a transit country.#Azerbaijan #Iran # Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇫🇮 New NATO exercises in Finland 🔻In Finland, the s...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇫🇮 New NATO exercises in Finland🔻In Finland, the second ten days of November are full of events in the North Atlantic Alliance format. From November 12 to 21, the Mallet Strike exercise began at the Lokhtaya military training ground and in the adjacent waters of the Gulf of Bothnia. In addition to the Finns, Americans, Swedes and Norwegians are participating in it. In total - about 1,300 military personnel, 450 units of military equipment and 20 combat aircraft. And it was planned in two stages: During the first, which ended on November 16, the use of ground and coastal air defense systems was worked out, and from November 17, the use of forces and means of the air component, that is, aviation.🔻Another exercise will take place from November 18 to 29 - Freezing Winds training of a NATO naval group in the Baltic Sea. It involves ships from the permanent NATO Naval Forces group, patrol and tactical aircraft. In total - about 4,500 military personnel, 25 aircraft, 30 ships. At the same time, American aircraft (ten F/A-18, one P-8A and one C-5A) will be deployed at the Finnish Tampere air base. The task of this exercise is to practice attacks by ship systems and blocking transit routes in the Baltic - read - blockade of the Gulf of Finland and the Kaliningrad region in the event of a war with Russia -.❗️There is, of course, nothing absolutely unexpected. Still, the main point of the Finns joining the Alliance was precisely this role because of the geographical position, which allows them to observe the northern latitudes and completely control the Gulf of Finland. High resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #USA #Finland@rybarSupport us

Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 18, 2024▪️ From the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports that in the area of ​​the settlement. Fierce fighting continues between Daryino and Novoivanovka. Our troops advanced near the village with heavy fighting. Nizhny Klin and Malaya Loknya, as well as in the Olgovsky forest. In the area of ​​the Olgovsky forest, about 200 personnel of the 17th brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and 50 people from other units attempted to break out of the encirclement. Katerynivka - village Gorlovka (Nikitovsky district): 2 shells of 155 mm caliber. On the street Paul Robson, a man born in 1983 was wounded. Title: 🇺🇸 About possible threats in cyberspace in 2025 The IIB School ...
Description: 🇺🇸 About possible threats in cyberspace in 2025 The IIB School published a forecast of American experts about threats in the cyberspace for 2025. And central to it is the influence of artificial intelligence both on the formation of these threats and countering them. Significant changes in this area are expected next year due to a sharp technological leap in the field of AI and the emergence of new methods of disinformation, propaganda, deception and falsification thanks to technologies based on AI such as deepfake content.▪️The authors of the article pay great attention to the use of malware to steal personal data and ransomware, which in connection with The emergence of new resources has also become even more sophisticated. ▪️In addition, according to the Americans, the old traditional ciphers are outdated. Due to the development of quantum technologies, methods that were previously effective no longer work, and next year the question of more stable encryption standards will become relevant. ❗️But with all this and the current assessment of modern threats in this space, the Americans left clichéd points about the -Big Four- - this is how they call Russia, China, Iran and North Korea, as the main sources of cyber danger within the framework of geopolitical confrontation.🔻With the advent of artificial intelligence, various spheres of life accelerated their development. Take the military field - AI is being implemented both in aircraft and drones, and is built into software to simplify search, analysis and target identification. And since these are new technologies, they have not yet been studied, and because of this there will be many problems, threats in cyberspace, which others will certainly take advantage of.#USA@rybarSupport usTelegramMIB School🇺🇸 The USA presented a forecast of threats in the cyber sphere for 2025🌐 Google and Mandiant experts presented the Cybersecurity Forecast 2025 document, dedicated to the analysis and forecasting of key trends and threats in the field of cybersecurity for the coming year. Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week 11 - November 17, 2024▪️Throughout the week, raids by Russian aviation and drones on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in the Odessa region did not stop. In Odessa, as a result of attacks on the port infrastructure, the sounds of explosions and secondary detonation were heard. ▪️After a long period of time, the Russian Armed Forces launched a combined strike on the so-called capital. Ukraine and Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in the Kyiv region. In Brovary, explosions were heard in the industrial area near the railway station of the same name and a reinforced concrete plant. ▪️Russian troops launched a massive combined attack on energy facilities in various Ukrainian regions. Serious problems with electricity were observed in the city of Rivne and the Rivne region, in the Zhytomyr region and neighboring Cherkasy region, as well as in Shostka, where the thermal power plant is located.▪️Over the past week, Ukrainian formations carried out several raids with unmanned vehicles on the rear Russian regions. The Crimea, Bryansk, Voronezh, Kaluga, Tver and Penza regions, as well as the Krasnodar Territory were hit. There is no significant damage. ▪️In Sevastopol, an explosive device was planted under the bottom of a car, activated remotely. A captain of the first rank, chief of staff of the 41st brigade of missile boats of the Black Sea Fleet, died on the spot.▪️In the Sudzhansky district, Russian attack aircraft gained a foothold in Darino, and on the opposite flank they control about 80% of Plekhovo. In the Korenevsky district east of Kremyany, several enemy attacks were repelled, and an armored group of the Russian Armed Forces tried to attack in the direction of Novaya Sorochina.▪️Reconnaissance groups of the Russian Armed Forces crossed the border in the Chernigov region and planted Russian flags in two Ukrainian border villages. After completing the combat mission, the detachment returned to the territory of the Russian Federation without losses.▪️In the Slobozhansky direction, positional battles continue in Volchansk, Liptsy, Staritsa and Tikhoy. There are no significant changes to the front line. The enemy continued to strike the Belgorod region and the regional center, as well as the oil depot in Stary Oskol, which had previously been repeatedly raided.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 🔴🔴🔴 Differences in wording - made a decision - and - are cl...
Description: Forwarded From SOLOVYOV🔴🔴🔴 Differences in wording - made a decision - and - are close to making a decision - on permission to hit the Russian Federation: Bloomberg vs. New York Times According to sources of the Bloomberg news agency, the United States may soon decide - on a partial lifting of restrictions on the use of Western weapons by Ukraine weapons for attacks on certain military targets in Russia - If this permission is given, most likely it will be used mainly in the Kursk region. However, as one of the agency’s interlocutors notes, the proposed resolution is unlikely to be as broad as Ukraine wants. Representatives of the National Security Council did not comment on the situation. The issue of North Korean military intervention, including in cooperation with China, is likely to be raised at the G20 summit, which begins on Monday in Brazil. Wording in the message such as -close to adoption-, -if approved- and -if it will be received- emphasize the uncertainty of the situation without confirming direct permission from the US President.

Title: ↩️ ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 Long-range missile strikes on old territories: ...
Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 On permission to use long-range missiles Since the Americans, represented by the outgoing administration, decided that there was no point sitting quietly on Sunday evening and, apparently, gave the go-ahead for the use of ATACMS in the old Russian territories, it’s time... ❗️🇷 🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 Beats long-range missiles at the old territories: how many missiles? And in conditions of approval from not only the United States, but also Great Britain and France, to fire long-range missiles at the old Russian territories, you need to look at it from a pragmatic military point of view. The euphoria of the Ukrainians was during the transmission of HIMARS, -Abramsov-, -Storm Shadow-, ATACMS, but it was short-lived. This did not lead to truly positive results, and Russian units adapted each time (even the head of the UK Ministry of Defense openly admits this, saying that any know-how lasts only two months). The West always transferred exactly as much to the Ukrainian Armed Forces as was needed for the Ukrainian formations to continue the conflict and causing limited damage to Russia (but not defeat).📍With the approval received, the situation will not change: they will only hit those targets that are approved by the countries that own these missiles and complexes. 🔻If these words are not convincing, well, let’s talk in the language of numbers (we already did an approximate calculation in early November). At the beginning of October, the Armed Forces of Ukraine had on its balance sheet: ▪️from 6 to 8 ATACMS missiles (one salvo); ▪️from 20 to 30 Storm Shadow/SCALP cruise missiles (from two to three salvos).▪️in early November, increased activity was recorded at Starokonstantinov, which may indicate additional deliveries. At the same time, throughout November, strikes were carried out on the airfield on a daily basis in order to reduce these reserves. Even if we assume that new batches of missiles were delivered to the territory of so-called Ukraine, then we can talk about a maximum of a couple of dozen missiles of each type. Their further fate, how many of these shipments were burned as a result of Russian attacks of the last month, is unknown. This is far from being a military threat that will be difficult to cope with. In the current situation, we are talking about repelling a very small number of familiar types of weapons, which our troops have learned to fight through trial and error in the Northern Military District zone. ❗️And this should be viewed primarily as a political move (as part of a general increase in stakes before the conflict moves into another phase), which will clearly be used by the Trump administration in order to further justify a possible refusal to directly support the so-called Ukraine (- The Biden administration even allowed strikes with precision weapons, but the Ukrainian Armed Forces failed-). In fact, sources from the Trump administration are already saying in the media that this decision may be reversed after Trump’s inauguration. #Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 About permission to use long-range missiles Since the Americans, represented by the outgoing administration, decided that there was no point in sitting quietly on Sunday evening and, apparently, gave the go-ahead for the use of ATACMS on old Russian territories , it's time...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 16-17, 2024. Russian troops launched a combined strike on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in almost all regions of the so-called. Ukraine. Power outages occur in the Rivne, Lvov and Dnepropetrovsk regions, the most widespread problems are observed in the Odessa region. The enemy hit an industrial enterprise in Izhevsk with a drone for the first time. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops are fighting in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts. In the latter, according to some data, Ukrainian formations are surrounded in a forested area. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces have gained a foothold in Yuryevka and are attacking Petrovka from neighboring Grigorovka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops have liberated Voznesenka, are fighting in Berestki, and have also gained a foothold in center of Trudovoy. In the Vremevsky direction, fighting continues on the northern outskirts of Makarovka, to which Ukrainian formations are trying to cling.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en)#BolshayaNovoselka #digest #Dnepropetrovsk #report #Donetsk #Izhevsk #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Lvov #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Rovno #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 Regarding information about permission for Ukraine to hit NATO...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Regarding information about permission for Ukraine to strike with long-range NATO weapons on Russian territory. There were also elements of the country’s strategic security: Tu-95 missile carriers and over-the-horizon radars. However, it is inappropriate to compare a drone flying at low speed with a warhead of up to 50 kg (maximum) and high-speed missiles designed to break through air defense lines.❗️It is important that if missile strikes inland (and the border areas have already been hit more than once by Western missiles ) countries will take place, then this will also solve the problem of studying the operation of our air defense system against American missiles around strategic objects. In this case, the missiles are still nuclear-free. The Supreme Commander stated in September that such a resolution would mean the direct participation of NATO countries in the conflict. Two majorsTelegramGlobalistics🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 Sunday evening turned out to be extremely fruitful for events. An American newspaper stated that Biden gave the green light to the use of long-range weapons, and the French and British followed suit and announced a similar decision in their countries.♦️All this...

Title: 🔁 About permission to fire long-range missiles. I’ll add a few w...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev About permission to fire long-range missiles. I’ll add a few words to my colleagues’ analysis: where will the missiles fly? Yes, everything is there. Military airfields, warehouses, military bases, perhaps hospitals too. - why - all there -? But because nothing new happened. These same missiles have struck before. Crimea, Novorossiya, Lugansk, attempts to strike the Crimean bridge. - the situation differs from the previous one only in the direction of the missile strikes. - Our air defense troops are familiar with these types of weapons. Remember how at first the enemy managed to break through the air defense, and how, the further, the more often the enemy failed. - yes, American missiles, as well as British and French, pose a great danger. But they know how to shoot them down. Much will depend on the decisions of local military leaders. For example, the deployment of aircraft at military airfields will have to take into account the new capabilities of the enemy. - The enemy continually attacks all our groups with different types of weapons. Yes, simpler, but still. The enemy is using Highmars, Hummer air bombs, drones and modernized S-200s. Has this somehow stopped our troops? - enemy drone strikes on our cities have generally prepared both the military and civilian authorities, and there are proven algorithms and protocols for responding in the event of an emergency - our air defense units are constantly learning and improving their skills. Even at the Yaroslavl Air Defense School, cadets are trained taking into account the experience of the Air Defense Forces - very important! After the first blows (and there will be, no doubt), incredible euphoria will reign in Ukrainian public spaces. Kyiv politicians will talk a lot of pretentious nonsense. The entire territory of the former Ukraine will celebrate hysterically. Under no circumstances should you pay attention to this. This is not the first time they will ride on emotional swings there. It is important for us not to sit on them - this will have the most minimal impact on the result of military operations as a whole. It's impossible to break us with this crap. Scare too. We will win without any doubt. We had more serious problems. We have already gone through and overcome so much that we will deal with this too. PS -Experts- who laughed at the -self-propelled grandfather-. Is it funny to you or not? https://t.me/rybar/65459TelegramRybar🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 About permission to use long-range missiles Since the Americans, represented by the outgoing administration, decided that there was no point in sitting quietly on Sunday evening and, apparently, gave the go-ahead to use ATACMS in the old way Russian territories, it’s time...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 16-17, 2024 The Israeli Air Force launched a series of attacks on the Ad-Dahiya neighborhood in the southern part of Beirut. One of the hits hit the Ba'ath Party headquarters in the Ras al-Nabaa area, killing the head of Hezbollah's media relations department. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, a total of 3,452 residents of the country have been killed since the beginning of the Israeli military operation - Arrows of the North, and more 14,664 were injured. Lebanese fighters attacked the north and center of Israel with kamikaze drones and missiles, damaging civilian infrastructure. In Haifa, a shell fell on a synagogue, injuring two Israelis. In Yavne, a drone hit a tower. In the western sector, Israeli troops advanced towards Shamaa from Al-Jibbein, as well as Teir Harfa. In the northeastern sector, the Israelis began a second offensive on Khiam, and also attacked north of Hula and south of Markaba. A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🔴🔴🔴 Full text of Vladimir Putin’s statement on the possible...
Description: Forwarded From SOLOVIOV🔴🔴🔴 Full text of Vladimir Putin’s statement on possible permission for the United States and its allies to fire long-range missiles deep into Russia dated September 12, 2024: This is not about permission or prohibition for the Kyiv regime to launch strikes on Russian territory. He also inflicts with the help of unmanned aerial vehicles and other means. But when it comes to the use of Western-made high-precision long-range weapons, this is a completely different story. The fact is that I have already talked about this, and any experts will confirm this, both for us and for us. in the West, the Ukrainian army is not able to strike with modern high-precision long-range systems of Western production. She can't do this. This is only possible with the use of intelligence data from satellites, which Ukraine does not have, this is data only from satellites or the European Union, or the United States - in general, from NATO satellites. This is the first. The second and very important, perhaps the key, is that flight missions in these missile systems can, in fact, only be carried out by military personnel of NATO countries. Ukrainian military personnel cannot do this. Therefore, we are not talking about allowing the Ukrainian regime to strike Russia with these weapons or not allowing them. We are talking about making a decision about whether NATO countries are directly involved in a military conflict or not. If this decision is made, it will mean nothing more than the direct participation of NATO countries, the United States, and European countries in the war in Ukraine. This is their direct participation, and this, of course, significantly changes the very essence, the very nature of the conflict. This will mean that NATO countries, the USA, and European countries are at war with Russia. And if this is so, then, bearing in mind the change in the very essence of this conflict, we will make appropriate decisions based on the threats that will be created for us.✍ Subscribe to Solovyov!

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 About permission to use long-range missiles Since...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 On permission to use long-range missiles Since the Americans, represented by the outgoing administration, decided that there was no point in sitting quietly on Sunday evening and, apparently, gave the green light to the use of ATACMS in the old Russian territories, it’s time to remember our September post, when The gossip on this topic has just begun.🔻From the point of view of possible threats, ATACMS in its strongest modification can reach a distance of 300 km, which creates a threat to command posts, airfields, places of deployment of personnel and hospitals where our wounded are located. This will at least force tactical level units to respond, since additional protection will be needed, especially air defense systems, and not only. We are talking about basic human ingenuity, that is, some will need to understand that formations and movements in columns will become even more dangerous.❗️And another nuance is that if Washington actually allowed the use of ballistic missiles, then other countries will follow the United States And, in addition to ATACMS, Storm Shadow and Scalp will fly in the Kursk region. And the Taurus may also appear (Scholz is also on the verge of leaving the German Olympus). Therefore, it’s time to look at the map, on which we also plotted the range of JASSM cruise missiles, which can hit even further. This is another step towards increasing the degree of conflict to the extreme point, which will not change the outcome, but will create big problems. The example of Crimea and new territories is proof of this. Difficulties arose, strikes were sometimes missed, but subsequently the number of missed missiles became less and less, and the enemy achieved no practical benefit. For now, we must wait for official confirmation from the White House, which remains silent. And all this at the moment looks like a test of the response of our leadership, especially after Vladimir Putin’s words that this will be regarded as NATO’s entry into the conflict. Title: 🔁 💡🇱🇹🇪🇪🇱🇻🇷🇺 The Baltic countries once again illustrated...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide💡🇱🇹🇪🇪🇱🇻🇷🇺 The Baltic countries once again illustrated the saying - to spite my mother I will freeze my ears -. In the center of the capital of Lithuania, a clock was installed that counts down the time remaining until the Baltic states withdraw from the energy ring with the Russian Federation and Belarus. A complete shutdown should occur on February 8, 2025.🔻On this day, the Baltic countries will disconnect from BRELL (the energy ring is named after the first letters of five countries: Belarus, Russia, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania) and join the unified European energy system. The Lithuanian authorities call this decision not just a political act, but an extremely important step from the point of view of national security. At the same time, the process is much more complicated and more multi-level than falling into another budget abyss, although the Balts will experience this in full. Disconnection from BRELL was officially recommended by NATO structures back in 2017. The plan for exiting it was drawn up in 2018, and Lithuania most fiercely hurried the project, while Latvia and Estonia preferred a wait-and-see approach. And this is quite logical: after all, they will be connected to the continental European power grid using the Lithuanian-Polish connection. 📌However, in this case, none of the countries will be able to win. BRELL allowed countries to keep the energy sector in relative balance: to do balancing due to the flow of cheap electricity from Russia and Belarus during consumption peaks, and in other periods to give it back, and at the end of the day, it turns out that no one took anything from anyone. In other cases, such a service must be paid for separately, and at an expensive rate, but in the BRELL energy ring it was, in fact, provided for free. But now the public of the Baltic states is being prepared not only for rising prices for electricity and even a possible shortage, but they are also persistently repeating: such a step necessary because Russia plans to disconnect everyone from the ring after the treaty expires on February 7. #energy #economy #Russia #Baltics @pezdicide no chemistry - just factsEADailyIn Lithuania, they started counting down the time of power outage from Russia at the wrong time: prices are risingIn the center of the Lithuanian capital, a clock was installed that counts down the time remaining until the Baltic states leave the country ;energy rings with Russia and Belarus. The anti-Russian action began at the wrong time. Like in all of Europe, due to the lack of wind in Lithuania prices have increased...

Title: 🖼 🇱🇹🇷🇺🇺🇸 Today’s massive strike on the territory of so-cal...

US Air Force B-52H bombers flew over the Baltic Sea, Estonia , Latvia and Lithuania launched guided aerial bombs at the Kazlu-Ruda training ground. Judging by statements to NATO, the training was carried out according to a conflict scenario in the Suwalki corridor area. There were four reconnaissance aircraft in the air during the B-52N strikes. They assessed the actions of Russian military personnel in the Kaliningrad region. NATO reconnaissance aircraft operate on the same principle in the Black Sea, looking for air defense positions and other important objects. This is the first demonstration flight of American nuclear carriers near Russian borders since the flight to the UK, and, most likely, not the last to the delight of the henchmen, if we recall previous business trips .High resolution mapEnglish version#Lithuania #NATO #Russia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the exercise Freedom Edge-2024/2 In additio...
Description: 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the exercise Freedom Edge-2024/2 In addition to increasing political interaction within the framework of trilateral relations, the authorities of Japan, the Republic of Korea and the United States continue to conduct military exercises near the borders of the DPRK and China. From November 13 to 15, the second stage of the Freedom Edge-2024/2 event took place. It was attended by Japanese and South Korean destroyers, as well as an American aircraft carrier group led by George Washington. Aviation was represented by F-35 and F/A-18 fighters (USA), F-16 and F-2 (Japan), F -35 and F-15 (South Korea). In total - about 3,000 military personnel, ten ships and 30 aircraft.🔻The event had more political overtones. In three days of training, the country would not have had time to work out anything. The ships and planes practiced air defense and missile defense, held a photo session with the participating ships and that was it. Its purpose was to demonstrate the strengthening of the triple alliance between the countries, which we talked about in the morning, against the backdrop of increasing activity of both Chinese troops and North Korean troops and general tension in region.High resolution mapEnglish version#Republic of Korea #USA #Japan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇺🇦🖇 And another clear episode of the targeted glorification...
Description: 🇺🇦🖇 And another clear episode of the targeted glorification of women in the ranks of Ukrainian formations. Let’s not pay attention to the fact that the filmer (also a woman) simply recorded the missile taking off, but for some reason hitting the stated target decided to leave them behind the scenes, accompanying them with the words -Gotcha!-. The point is not that, but that the Ukrainian authorities deliberately focus attention on women. In the conditions of widespread mobilization, men will soon run out, but people will still be needed. And there are fewer and fewer radicalized individuals like Taira in the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and it is necessary to popularize service in the army. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the attempted Ukrainian attack by BECs in the B...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the attempted Ukrainian attack by BECs in the Black Sea While all eyes were on the massive strike of the Russian Armed Forces on the territory of the so-called Ukraine, the Armed Forces of Ukraine quietly decided to attack in the Black Sea. Around 4-6 in the morning, a group of unmanned boats was spotted in the area of ​​gas fields west of Crimea. These are those objects that, after the start of the special operation, ceased to function for security reasons, but the infrastructure in the form of towers remained there, and periodically the Ukrainian side tries to seize them and land them personnel on existing platforms.❓The last one was in September. Drilling platforms are quite large in area and can accommodate weapons such as ATGMs or MANPADS, as well as fuel and supplies. Moreover, they can be equipped with communications equipment and repeaters, which will increase their capabilities at sea. Remember the inglorious landings in Crimea? Their main disadvantage was that the distance was large, and there was no way to supply the units and monitor their movements. And it’s impossible to retreat, so the missions were always one-way. And to solve this problem, the Main Intelligence Directorate wants to control these towers. But our units immediately detected the appearance of BECs and sent an interception group after them, which began shooting them with small arms. As a result, four of the five drones were destroyed, the last one turned around and departed in the direction of Odessa. There was also a sixth one, but he took a different route and was spotted 35 km from Cape Tarkhankut, where he was conducting reconnaissance. But after a Black Sea Fleet helicopter was sent after him, the BEC turned around and also disappeared in the direction of the Odessa region.❗️The important thing is that there have not been such BEC raids for a very long time, and the resumption of their activity indicates that the Ukrainian Armed Forces have replenished their supplies. Today, a missile threat was introduced several times in Crimea, including in the eastern parts of the peninsula. We will watch, but clearly the enemy will not stop at just this attack. High resolution mapEnglish version#Odessa #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the combined strike of the Russian Armed Forces...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the combined strike of the Russian Armed Forces on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine - what is known by 16.00 That night, for the first time in a long time, Russian troops launched a massive attack on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine, which became one of the largest since the beginning of the NWO.🔻According to the Ukrainian authorities, 120 missiles were fired during the attack, including cruise and ballistic missiles such as Zircons, Iskanders and Kinzhals, and 90 UAVs. The enemy traditionally stated that most of the missiles and drones were shot down.▪️The main target of the Russian troops, judging by messages on the Internet, were energy facilities and enterprises related to the production of military products. The strikes were carried out on major cities, including Kyiv, Odessa, Dnepr, Kremenchug and Krivoy Rog. The latter also has problems with the operation of boiler houses, there is a partial lack of heat and water supply in the city, and critical infrastructure is powered by generators.▪️After the attacks, emergency power outages were introduced in various regions of the country, including Kyiv and Odessa. Energy Minister German Galushchenko confirmed that there were serious power outages. According to the energy company DTEK, several thermal power plants were also hit.▪️In Nikolaev, the strikes led to significant damage to infrastructure and power outages. One of the targets, according to preliminary information, was the Kulbakino airfield. On the territory of the base there are drones, as well as warehouses with ammunition.▪️The mayor of Odessa reported a complete stop of electric transport and difficulties in the work of public utilities. In Lviv, fires and damage to infrastructure facilities were recorded.❗️In Rivne, according to preliminary information, the 330/110 kV Rivne substation was hit, the extent of damage to the facility is not yet clear. At the same time, power outages were also noticed in the city and region. There are problems with the operation of boiler houses, there is a partial lack of heat and water supply in the city, and critical infrastructure is powered by generators.▪️In addition, several railway sections were de-energized, and backup diesel locomotives were sent to restore traffic.📌 Footage of arrivals in the city area also appeared on the Internet Yaremche in the Ivano-Frankivsk region, where a large railway station of the same name is located. In addition, not far from the city in the mountains there is the 136th missile and ammunition supply center (military unit A-1807), which could also have been the target of the raid. High-resolution map#digest #Russia #Ukraine #electricity @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Just yesterday, colleagues wrote about the role of military ...

It's certainly a tragic situation. Loss in the family. Husband, father. Let's leave aside the embroidered shirts and children's hairstyles. Although in this there is definitely a symbol and a position. But look at the kind of socks the lady is wearing. The burning Kremlin, curses on Russia. You see, they didn’t just go and do something like this. This whole industry must work, produce socks with a certain design, knowing for sure that there will be demand. And there is it. Now I can explain and describe for a long time. But is it necessary, given that everything is so obvious?

Title: 🇨🇳🇺🇸 About the negotiations between Xi Jinping and Joe Biden ...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸 About the negotiations between Xi Jinping and Joe Biden One of the main events of the past week was the meeting between Chinese President Xi Jinping and American President Joe Biden. While the media emphasizes the Chinese leader’s readiness to work with the new US administration, the parties also touched upon other important aspects during the negotiations. In particular, the results of the past four years were summed up - not least in both Chinese and American press releases are occupied by the achievements that were achieved during this period. In addition, Xi and Biden discussed issues related to relations between the two countries. There was also the expression of opinions on regional issues, positions on which differ on both sides. The list includes the South China Sea dispute, the Korean Peninsula and, of course, Taiwan. ▪️The Ukrainian conflict was also on the agenda - the American side once again expressed concern about Beijing’s support for Moscow, and the Chinese presented their consistent position on this issue. In general, nothing new. It is noteworthy that the Chinese press release paid much attention to the principles and framework of bilateral relations. The Chinese side identified red lines, which included the Taiwan issue, human rights, China's system and path, as well as the PRC's right to development. They, according to the Chinese press release, should be indisputable. 📌In general, nothing breakthrough was expected from the meeting, because one of its participants will leave the White House early next year. The Chinese will conduct a more detailed dialogue with the new American administration, for which, most likely, the ground was already prepared at this meeting. Perhaps, with the help of the mentioned principles and red lines, the Chinese authorities outlined the contours of interaction with the cabinet of Donald Trump, directly indicating what is possible and what is not. The new American administration may heed these signals, but will inevitably flirt with Beijing's red lines without crossing them completely. #China #US @rybar with @awaken_dragon Support us Reuters Biden, Xi set for tense final meeting in Peru as Trump era looms Joe Biden meets Chinese president Xi Jinping for the last time as U.S. president on Saturday, but the leaders' goal of lowering tensions before Donald Trump's inauguration is challenged by fresh conflicts over cyber crime, trade, Taiwan and Russia.

Title: 🇺🇸🇰🇷🇯🇵 Military ties between the United States, South Korea...
Description: 🇺🇸🇰🇷🇯🇵 Military ties between the United States, South Korea and Japan continue to strengthen. The leaders of the three countries recently met to discuss further defense cooperation, mainly aimed at containing North Korea. In particular, the negotiations focused on the creation of a tripartite secretariat. The main tasks of such a body are to coordinate defense cooperation and ensure the fulfillment of the parties’ obligations. The parties thus continue to lay the foundation for a full-fledged trilateral alliance aimed at containing threats not only on the Korean Peninsula, but throughout the Asia-Pacific region. Consider the mention of the South China Sea problem in a joint statement issued following a recent meeting. The creation of the secretariat is another step towards institutionalizing the US-South Korea-Japan partnership. It must be considered in the context of the conclusion of a trilateral cooperation agreement this summer, which outlines the contours of the development of defense ties, but is not legally binding. The same will most likely affect the activities of the secretariat. Therefore, the activities of the new body may be complicated by changes in the political course of the three parties. While it is too early to talk about changes in the foreign policies of Japan and South Korea, the new term of Donald Trump’s presidency could make significant adjustments to the trilateral partnership. And in this situation, even attempts to formalize ties may be ineffective. #USA #South Korea #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+Japan, U.S., South Korea set up secretariat to enshrine cooperationThe leaders of Japan, the United States and South Korea announce the creation of a secretariat to further align their policies and actions, about two months before U.S. President-elect Donald Trump returns to power with his go-it-alone approach to foreign…

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇬🇧🇺🇸 Speaking about AUKUS and the impact of the confli...
Description: 🇦🇺🇬🇧🇺🇸 Speaking about AUKUS and the impact of the conflict in so-called Ukraine on the nature of combat operations, it is necessary to mention recent tests conducted in the United States by the British company BlueBear (since 2023 owned by the Swedish Saab). Within a month in the United States military personnel and specialists from various structures and companies in the US, UK and Australia tested the implementation of the Centurion AI system, developed by Saab, as part of the called the Convergence project. The point is that in the AUKUS format the technology of swarm use of drones using artificial intelligence was successfully tested. The drones successfully hit the targets, and after that it was noted that data from the UAV was simultaneously sent to specialists from three countries. That is, we get the following picture: The Anti-China Alliance is introducing new technologies, relying on the experience of a special operation, where Ukrainian formations tested the swarm system in various directions at the front. We did not note any actual combat use, but we saw FPV drones flying in a wedge in both the Kherson and Donetsk directions. The combat use of AI capabilities is the expected result of the development of these technologies. But another important point is that the British confirmed the successful exchange of data between the countries of the bloc through the same system. That is, AUKUS is gradually turning from a PR block into a real counterweight to China in the region. #Australia #Great Britain #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 Our missile bypassed the -IRIS-T- air defense system and hit t...

Title: 🇸🇴🇹🇷 Turkish authorities are actively increasing military coo...
Description: 🇸🇴🇹🇷 Turkish authorities are actively increasing military cooperation with the Somali authorities. The number of bilateral agreements between countries has increased significantly over the past 15 years. One of the very first and most important agreements was the 2010 agreement on cooperation in military training, which paved the way for Somali commands to Turkey to take courses. And recently in training center in Isparta, training began on conducting counter-terrorist operations for ten special forces - Gorgor - the Somali Armed Forces - about 400 people in total. Every year the Turks conduct similar courses for Somalis, but previously their number did not exceed 100-200 people. Turkish instructors are now training twice as many Somalis. With the Turks viewing the Horn of Africa as an area of ​​strategic interest, increasing aid to Somalia seems a natural way to consolidate its presence in the region. #Africa #Somalia #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇵🇱🇺🇦 About the testing of the Polish BEC The Polish comman...
Description: 🇵🇱🇺🇦 About testing the Polish BEKThe Polish command is actively introducing unmanned systems of various stripes into its armed forces. They have -Bayraktars-, leased from the USA MQ-9A, in addition to this, they have Warmate. Recently they sent the UAV -Kruk- to the so-called Ukraine. Recently, sea trials of a submersible autonomous system called -Gavia- were carried out in the port of Gdynia. This is a drone capable of performing tasks underwater at a depth of up to 1000 meters with a duration of about 6 hours. The developer, of course, is not the Poles. In December 2023, Teledyne Tech. opened a service center for servicing unmanned drones together with the Polish company ENAMOR, where they developed -Gavia-.🔻The main task of this system is military, since they are tested in mine action operations and in monitoring the underwater situation. Moreover, the Poles have already sent a drone to the Aegean Sea, where it was involved in the Aegean Seal exercise. Since in order to correctly assess the effectiveness of this or that weapon in the West, it is customary to send it all to the so-called Ukraine, then this is also possible in this case. The Ukrainian side has already used similar BECs - Remus, supplied by the Germans. So, if they appear somewhere near Odessa, we will not be surprised. #Poland #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for November 17, 2024 ▪️ The past week was fu...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for November 17, 2024▪️ The past week was full of headlines in the world press about possible -negotiations- against the backdrop of the formation of his administration and cabinet by US President-elect Trump. The voiced lists contain many critics of the Ukrainian regime and the constant allocation of money to Kyiv. It is significant that many of Trump’s planned appointments ended up on the Ukrainian website -Peacemaker- or were subjected to harsh criticism by Ukrainian government departments. However, Trump has not yet come into his own, and the Biden administration plans to pump up the Armed Forces of Ukraine with billions of dollars worth of weapons and equipment by January 20 (the lion's share of which will remain in the United States, of course).▪️ Simultaneously with many catchy articles about -negotiations- in Europe continues military preparations for a big war with Russia. A US missile defense base has been opened in the city of Redzikowo (Poland), and Rheinmetall's profits are growing. Even Scholz’s demanding and clumsy call to the Supreme Commander took place against the backdrop of regular news about new supplies of German air defense systems to Kyiv. That is, for now the words in newspaper articles are separate, but the real actions of the countries of the potential enemy are separate.▪️ At the front, the Russian Army maintains the initiative, pushing through the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in several directions. Kurakhovo is being compressed into a semi-encirclement; heavy fighting has broken out in the city itself. The hysterical undermining of the Kurakhovsky reservoir dam by the Armed Forces of Ukraine also did not help matters: the volume of water was not enough to create a water barrier to the west of the reservoir. ▪️ A new element was the entry of our units into Kupyansk. Fierce fighting ensued, but the assault groups managed to gain a foothold in the industrial zone. The zone of control of the Russian Armed Forces is expanding further to the south - at Kruglyakovka and Kolesnikovka. ▪️ Fighting continues for every house in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) and Chasov Yar. Pokrovsk is being prepared by the enemy for defense; our troops on the approaches to the city are pulling up their rear and expanding the zone of control around previously achieved lines.▪️ The front has also begun to move in the Vremevsky direction. They report the advance of the Russian Armed Forces towards Novodarovka and Rovnopol. It should be understood that the Ukrainian Armed Forces have retained the same attack helicopters, and at least one case of their use has been recorded. ▪️ The Armed Forces of Ukraine on the Zaporozhye front are urgently staffing the second line of defense with diverse units, awaiting our large-scale offensive.▪️ The news about -beautiful reports- from the Kursk region became unpleasant this week. It is reliably known that extremely difficult battles are taking place, the enemy is throwing reserves and expensive NATO armored vehicles into battle to release some of its units. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are drawing more and more forces into the region, which has actually become a new Bakhmut meat grinder for them. Weather conditions aggravate the situation for the enemy. ▪️ Due to the large expenditure of personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Kyiv is intensifying mobilization measures, announcing the need to send another 160 thousand people to the front. Despite the low level of moral and psychological state of the enemy troops, the draconian regime makes it possible to solve the problem of maintaining an organized defense. The formation and arming of Ukrainian Armed Forces brigades in NATO countries continues. Mass desertion and the low level of training of newly formed enemy units have not yet led to the collapse of the front. ✨Thus, the information wave about Trump-style negotiations does not affect the front. The Russian army continues its offensive on several fronts, and heavy fighting is taking place. It is most likely that the closure of the project - Ukraine - by the Western owners will last as long as it brings profit. That is, until the last Ukrainian. The summary was compiled by: Two majors

Title: 🔁🎬 Another attempt by a Ukrainian to stir up an international s...
Description: Forwarded From Older than EddaThe Ukrainian's next attempt to stir up an international scandal turned against him. On November 14, all Ukrainian information resources exploded with news about the alleged murder of a civilian woman by the Russian military in the village of Terny, DPR. As evidence, two screenshots from the video taken from the copter were attached. The crest bashfully decided not to show the video itself. And today it became clear exactly why. Guardsmen of the 144th Motorized Rifle Division, as the village is liberated, are evacuating the population from the combat zone, which the Armed Forces of Ukraine used there as a human shield for about two years. A couple of days ago, our fighter took two more people out of the village. At that moment, a Ukrainian machine gunner began working on all three from cover. As a result, our fighter and two civilians were killed. The video clearly shows the bodies of the Russian military man and the locals whom he accompanied, trying to save, and also captures the moment when another of our soldiers, who came out to the sound of shooting, also came under fire from an ambush and died .I will remind you once again that the Little Russian lies every time he opens his mouth. I hope this video will be reviewed by the relevant authorities and international organizations, which will take the necessary measures. Unfortunately, people’s lives cannot be returned, but the Kiev regime and everyone involved in the execution of its criminal orders must be punished for their atrocities. Video is too big

Title: 🔁🎬 📺 Project manager -Rybar- Mikhail Zvinchuk is a guest of th...
Description: Forwarded From RTVI📺 Project Manager -Rybar- Mikhail Zvinchuk is a guest of the new episode of the program -You hold on!- with Marianna Minsker on RTVI. We have collected the main thing: 💬 About the situation in the Kursk region: - Russian troops continue to methodically destroy enemy targets. Since we have knocked out all the air defense systems in this area from the enemy, our drones are flying painlessly, <...> Our aviation is constantly working, we are hitting the border areas and hitting logistics. In essence, we are cutting off all methods of transporting ammunition and personnel.💬 About the DPRK soldiers at the front: -The more foreigners who have received Russian citizenship fight on the side of the Russian army, the lighter the burden is for us and for the Russian army. within within mobilization events that can be repeated, because people are always needed for the front.💬 About the situation in Kupyansk and Pokrovsk: - The fighting for Kupyansk itself has not yet begun. <...> The enemy retains the ability to both build up its contingent and withdraw it. <...> [The capture of Pokrovsk] will be the same intensive and difficult task as, for example, the capture of Mariupol. This battle will determine further progress towards Slavyansk, Kramatorsk and further to the north.💬 About how Donald Trump can change the situation in Ukraine: - It seems to me that the Ukrainian side can do something as the last tranche then give, <...> to please both supporters of Ukraine and opponents. And then there will be compulsion to peace.💬 When the fighting in Ukraine ends: - Before the new year it is unlikely we will experience at least some kind of freeze, and we have to finish the SVO for ourselves  high note. A high note could be the full return of those territories that we claim -⭕ Subscribe to RTVI

Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 On the possible vector of American policy under Trump in...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 About the possible vector of American policy under Trump in Armenia Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan had a telephone conversation with US President-elect Donald Trump, in which he presented information about the current situation in relations between the countries in recent years. The issue of possible changes in the policy of the new US administration In relation to Armenia, the latter's public is extremely interested. After all, Pashinyan’s team openly relied on Kamala Harris, which once again emphasizes, to put it mildly, the short-sightedness of the Armenian authorities.▪️For example, the Armenian Ambassador to the United States Lilit Makunts participated in the election campaign of the Democratic Party. And last summer, together with a delegation of deputies from the ruling party - Civil Contract - she attended the Democratic convention in Chicago, where Harris was nominated as a presidential candidate. This is enough for the current authorities of Armenia to be considered by the new administration as an asset of the Democratic Party, which was bribed, among other things, with American taxpayers' money. ▪️From an economic point of view, Armenia is not of significant interest to Americans. So the attitude towards the country will depend solely on external factors. First of all, from Trump’s relations with Iran and Russia, against which the Americans are able to continue to use Armenia. ▪️Although Trump used the Armenian issue during the election campaign: he accused the Democrats of allowing ethnic cleansing of Christians in Nagorno-Karabakh. But the statement was clearly designed to win back the votes of the Armenian diaspora in the United States. At the same time, the largest lobbying organization of Armenians, ANCA, did not support any of the candidates, accusing both parties of promoting Azerbaijan and defeating Armenia. 🔻However, one thing is clear: the new administration in the United States will not in any way affect the return of Armenia’s subjectivity in regional politics. The pro-Turkish vector of the country's development will continue, and Azerbaijan will continue to put pressure on the Armenians, demanding new concessions. #Armenia #USA @rybarSupport usTACCPashinyan and Trump discussed issues of regional importanceEvents in Russia and the world. Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Recently, evidence of the use of Russian...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Recently, evidence of the use of captured equipment by Russian troops has increasingly appeared. The practice can only be welcomed - in recent years, the Russian Armed Forces have had enough captured samples. This is especially true for Western-made infantry delivery vehicles, which have high security in comparison with the BMP-1/2 or MT-LB. The Bradleys are a fairly durable vehicle that can be used purely as a transporter. In this case, the bottleneck is a possible shortage of components, but a lot of trophies have been collected recently, and some can be disassembled for spare parts. In any case, it is more appropriate than just distribute them at exhibitions. #Russia #Ukraine@rybar support ustelegrama-person-bearing aircraft and a slightly modified armored car-4x4, executed by the Canadian company -streit Group- on the Ford-550 chassis. Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 A cycle of lies from near Seversk: the final (?) Une...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 A cycle of lies from near Seversk: finale (?) Suddenly, very unusual news came from the Seversk direction, although again related to the fake capture of populated areas. This time it was positive.▪️Several commanders in this direction were detained and removed from their positions due to deception of the higher command. We are talking about some commanders from units of the 3rd Army: someone was detained and arrested, someone was removed or transferred to a lower position. The event affected several brigade and battalion commanders. ▪️This, as we wrote, was expressed in -occupation- exclusively on the Internet through friendly bloggers and war correspondents of Serebryanka, Grigorovka, Belogorovka and Verkhnekamensky, as well as, apparently, Vyemka (as well as feverish attempts to recapture it).▪️Alas, instantaneous there was no reaction: the system is inert, and attempts to expose lies are perceived as -pressure- (principle - if they criticize, it means I’m doing everything right-). As a result, the initial reports about, to put it mildly, -problems- (although this can more be called outright outrage) ultimately did not result in anything: commanders of different levels synchronized watches and continued to fool high headquarters. It’s good that after that scandal there were no statements about the liberation of new settlements (and that’s a joy).🔻As a result, everything turned out to be much more prosaic: higher authorities came and wanted to visit the -liberated-Belogorovka, which was already, in theory, deep-deep the rear, since Grigorovka and Serebryanka were allegedly taken. And only then the scale of the deception was revealed, which went not only to the media, but also to higher headquarters. Moreover, the lies were not only not only in the reports, but also -legendized-. Correspondents were invited to the positions to interview fighters who boasted in the media about the capture of non-existent villages. 📍On the Internet, of course, there is an opinion that they allegedly managed to take some positions, then the enemy counterattacked, after which they had to be abandoned. However, in reality there was no talk of any capture - neither then nor now. And now, regardless of whether the voice of those crying in the wilderness was heard, or the deception was actually revealed by accident, the activities of at least some of those responsible have already attracted the interest of specialized services. And we very much hope that questions about both the mediocre waste of personnel in unprepared assaults and the wearing down of armored groups from month to month against the same support will be raised at the very top. #media technologies #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine #fake@rybarSupport usTelegramCallsign《OSETIN》After coverage of the situation by Comrades Majors, Rybar, Podolyaka and other channels near Belogorovka (in the Seversky direction), namely, incorrect reports from the command, incomprehensible assaults and more - the result appeared. The commander of the 3rd Army was removed from his post...

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Footage of the use of the Russian Ka-52 to intercept ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Footage of the use of the Russian Ka-52 to intercept a Ukrainian UAV near Kazan has surfaced on the Internet. At first, the helicopter crew unsuccessfully tries to shoot down the drone with a cannon, but ultimately uses an air-to-air missile to destroy the target. The video shows several points at once. On the one hand, this is further evidence of the fundamental possibility of using helicopters to combat drone strikes, given the appropriate organization and technical equipment. At the same time, the recording illustrates the difficulties in defeating drones. As we wrote a year ago, not every type of aircraft is suitable for this - the Mi-24 and Mi-8 with old avionics are worse suited for this role than the Mi-28 and Ka-52. However, the number of the latter is limited, and they are required at the front. In any case, one can observe an active search for means of countering UAV attacks in rear areas, from mobile fire groups and protective metal screens at oil refineries to interceptor drones. It cannot be ruled out that specialized small aircraft will soon appear.#Russia #Tatarstan #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇸☢️ Russia introduces temporary restrictions on the supply...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸☢️ Russia is introducing temporary restrictions on the supply of enriched uranium to the United States. The decision was made at the direction of Vladimir Putin in response to US sanctions, implying restrictions on the import of Russian uranium products in 2024-2027 and a complete ban from 2028. 🔻In accordance with the new decision, it will no longer be possible to simply export enriched uranium to the United States or do so under foreign trade agreements with persons registered in the jurisdiction of the United States. However, an exception is provided in the form of supplies under one-time licenses issued by the Federal Service for Technical and Export Control (FSTEC). It seems that now the supply chain will change somewhat: China will be able to buy enriched uranium in Russia, then it will be sold to Europe, and from Europe it will follow in the USA. In the States, by the way, there are plans to commission 200 GW of capacity by 2050. How much they will be able to add 35 GW in the next 10 years remains to be seen. In general, peaceful nuclear power is now intended to serve first-tier countries and manufacturing countries, like China and South Korea. At the same time, those countries that have lost their economic importance are experiencing all the difficulties from curtailing their nuclear program - this is exactly what is happening in Germany or Japan. It is unlikely that in the near future we will see the creation of a uranium embargo system, but there is clearly a process of tightening control over deposits, enrichment. And, of course, the construction of nuclear power plants. #Russia #USA@rybarSupport usgovernment.ru The government introduced temporary restrictions on the export of enriched uranium to the USA Resolution No. 1544 of November 14, 2024

Title: 🎬🖼 🇦🇿🇷🇺🌓 Calls for interethnic massacre - was there a boy?...
Description: 🇦🇿🇷🇺🌓 Calls for interethnic massacre - was there a boy? Over the past few hours, a video has gone viral on social networks with Azerbaijani citizens walking with Azerbaijani flags at the Moscow Financial and Legal University (MFLU) and who, at first glance, are shouting - Cut the Russians, Azerbaijan -.🔻But online -twisted- the situation. The video circulating on the Internet is a screen recording from the social network Instagram, which is banned in the Russian Federation. In the original, the shouts of -Yaşasın Azərbaycan!-, which means -Long live Azerbaijan-, are clearly audible. Due to the poor quality of the screen recording, the sounds were distorted, and it seemed as if the Azerbaijanis were calling to go against Russian citizens, and the general sentiments of the population towards ethnic communities in the country, in in particular - to the Azerbaijani one, they did the rest.❗️ Moreover, the personnel are not even from MFYU. Apparently, the original video was filmed at the Financial University under the Government of the Russian Federation on Leningradsky Prospekt. On November 14 at 17.00 there was a student festival for Azerbaijani students. This was reported on their channel, which has now been deleted. In the background footage you can see MADI University, which is also located on Leningradsky Prospekt.📌 There was no specific call from these students. The distorted recording and the attitude of the population towards foreigners from the neighboring countries against the backdrop of the situation in Russia did everything by spreading the video on social networks. And the reason for all this is the failures in migration policy, which resulted in hundreds of incidents with migrants, including from Azerbaijan. Ethnic communities feel at home in Russia, regardless of laws or regulations, which leads to such events. The reaction of most Russians was quite expected. Wandering around the center of Moscow with the flags of another country and shouting slogans in your own language in Russia - all this will be regarded as disrespect for the Russian-speaking population and Russia itself, which is what ultimately happened. #Azerbaijan #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇫🇷🇨🇫 While Russian military specialists continue to clean up ...
Description: 🇫🇷🇨🇫 While Russian military specialists continue to clear the Central African Republic of remnants of gangs, the country's president, Touadera, continues to fall into the arms of the French. Funds in the amount of 10 million euros are aimed both at solving internal problems and at holding elections in 2025.❗️In this regard, the problem that we have raised more than once with - pulling the blanket - between the security forces of Russia and the lack of lobbying in the interests of domestic business creates favorable conditions for external players. Which is relevant both in the context of the activity of the French and the PRC, which is heavily investing in the CAR. Yes, this will not affect our military presence of the Russian Federation in the country, since the leadership in Bangui is relying on Russian specialists. But the question arises as to how rational it is to keep troops in a country where others skim the cream.#Africa #CAR #France@rybarSupport usLe Monde.frCentrafrique : la France reprend son aide après trois ans d'interruptionLa France a fait un don -  ;sans conditionnalité -de 10 millions d'euros à la République centrafricaine. Cette aide avait été gelée en 2021 en raison d’une campagne antifrançaise téléguidée par Moscou, dont le pays avait été jugé - complice -.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 During yesterday's protests in Abkhazia, protesters seize...
Description: 🇷🇺 During yesterday’s protests in Abkhazia, protesters seized the parliament building. At night, reports appeared about the alleged resignation of President Aslan Bzhania, but he said that he would do so only when the facility was liberated. Afterwards, early elections will take place, where the politician will nominate his candidacy.📌 Although some resources managed to see almost a -color revolution- in what happened, in fact the event does not stand out too much against the background of the local political background. In 2014, the opposition also seized buildings in Sukhum, as a result of which the head of the republic, Alexander Ankvab, resigned. Moreover, Aslan Bzhania himself came to power in 2020 during similar protests, which were accompanied by the storming of the presidential administration building and the resignation of Raul Khadzhimba, who previously removed Ankvab. So such political crises in Abkhazia are rather the norm. It is also worth noting that this usually happens without bloodshed and very violent clashes, although in Abkhazia almost every house you meet has a firearm. Such protests are also not explicitly anti-Russian, at least at the moment.❗️However, all this does not remove the points already noted: the republic, which lives off the Russian budget, refuses to conclude an investment agreement with Russia and wags its tail on other issues. Which leads to reputational and other costs, which over time will raise certain issues head on. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big
