Title: 🇲🇱🇳🇪🇹🇬 The Togolese authorities are making efforts to obtai...
Description: 🇲🇱🇳🇪🇹🇬 The Togolese authorities are making efforts to obtain investments from the Sahel Troika countries for the construction of a sea harbor. To this end, the delegation of the autonomous port of Lomé conducted an advertising campaign in the landlocked capitals of Niger and Mali. This occurs against the background of a conflict between the authorities in Benin and Niamey, where the former, under US pressure, closed the Chinese pipeline from Niger territory. Therefore, in neighboring Togo they are trying to pull the blanket over themselves: the country is actively playing on Pan-African sentiments and participating in the exercises of the Alliance of Sahel States. The ultimate goal is to become a gateway to the ocean for Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso, creating for them an important strategic route and receiving considerable profit from this. However, the nuance is that the Togolese authorities are in fact open supporters of the French line. And no matter what services are offered in Togo, any investment can turn against sovereign states with one order from Paris. Therefore, for Russia's allied countries in the region, the governments of Senegal or Mauritania look like more reliable partners in this area.#Africa #Mali #Niger #Togo@rybarSupport usTogofirstAfter Visiting Niger, Port of Lomé Delegation Promotes Its Services in MaliThe Port Autonome de Lomé (PAL) is committed to getting closer to economic operators in Sahelian countries. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 16, 2024 ▪️ At night, Ger...

Explosions were reported in Kyiv, Zaporozhye and the Cherkasy region.▪️ The enemy tried to attack our regions with counter actions: twelve aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region. In the Kaluga region in the morning, on the outskirts of the city of Lyudinovo, a UAV exploded. ▪️ A new element of the situation was the footage published yesterday of our reconnaissance group entering the Chernigov region from Bryansk. Our units planted flags in the village. Gremyach and Ants. The enemy reassures its audience that it is not possible to defend these villages due to complex logistics and the forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were withdrawn from there.▪️ In the Kursk region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are conducting a maneuverable defense; an unsuccessful enemy counterattack was reported near the Olgovsky forest. On the southern flank of the Sudzhansky direction, Russian troops continue to attack in the Plekhovo area. There are oncoming battles. Berestki, gaining a foothold on the approaches from the northeast. Ilyinka (west of Antonovka).▪️ From the Vremevsky direction they report repelling a counterattack by the Ukrainian enemy and successfully consolidating ours in Rovnopol and advancing to Novodarovka.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to strike the city of Shebekino with the help of drones. In the village of Borisovka, Volokonovsky district, a kamikaze drone attacked a parked car. In the village of Gruzskoe, Borisov district, while walking with a dog in a forest planting, a man was blown up by an explosive device▪️ In the DPR, in the Central City district of Gorlovka, a woman born in 1950 was injured as a result of an enemy artillery strike. In addition, when an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV, a man born in 1942 received moderate injuries, while men born in 1968 and 1938 were injured. In the village of Panteleimonovka, Yasinovatsky municipal district  When an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV, a man born in 1968 received moderate injuries. The Ukrainian Armed Forces fired more than 50 ammunition. Used  barrel artillery with a caliber of 155 mm, including cassette type, as well as attack UAVs. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 15, 2024. Russian troops launched several attacks on targets in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, including in the area of ​​the Odessa port. The enemy attacked Russian regions with drones, air defense systems shot down more than 50 drones. In the North Ukrainian direction, military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces crossed the border in the Chernigov region and planted Russian flags in several settlements. In the Kursk region, Ukrainian formations tried to attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in the area of ​​the Olgovsky forest near Kremyany, but did not achieve success and retreated. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian attack aircraft approached Kupyansk from the east and are fighting in the industrial zone on the outskirts of the city. In the Pokrovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces advanced west from Novoalekseevka and approached Yuryevka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian military personnel completely liberated Antonovka and are advancing in the direction of Berestki .In the Vremevsky direction, attack aircraft repelled counterattacks Ukrainian military and gained a foothold in Rovnopol, and also advanced on the approaches to Novodarovka. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: a series of local attacks by...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: a series of local attacks by the Russian Armed Forces Situation towards the end of November 15, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue to develop their successes. Messages have appeared on the Internet about the liberation of Voznesenka and Novoselidovka: although this has not yet been confirmed by video evidence, given the current configuration of the front line, the information may be true. Advancement was also noticed within the borders of Novoselidovka.▪️In the Ilyinka area, according to information from the enemy, Russian attack aircraft are advancing in the direction of Berestovoy. The Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of Stepanovka: in fact, the settlement was taken several days ago, and it was through it that the Russian Armed Forces reached Ilyinka.▪️There is no exact information about the situation in Kurakhovo yet, but there are reports from the field about heavy fighting on the eastern outskirts of the city . In the Dalniy area, the gray zone was expanded, and to the east an increase in the zone of control of the Russian Armed Forces was recorded, which is confirmed by footage of the movement of Russian armored groups under fire from the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️Russian troops also liberated the village of Antonovka, hoisting a flag on the northwestern outskirts. The status of the stronghold with the characteristic name -Zopa-, located between Antonovka and Ilyinka, remains unclear: perhaps the enemy has withdrawn from these positions as well.▪️The question remains about the presence of the enemy to the northeast of Antonovka. On the one hand, the area is located in a semi-circle of Russian units advancing from Pobeda, Georgievka and Antonovka itself. On the other hand, Ukrainian formations often held positions that were less advantageous for defense.▪️At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces finally liberated Maksimovka, knocking the enemy out of the village and advanced at least two kilometers north in the direction of Sukha Yalov. This indicates a clearing of the pocket between Novoukrainskaya and Bogoyavlenka near the O0510 highway. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version# digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇱🇹🇷 Are Turks welcome in the Sahel? It is no secret that Tur...
Description: 🇲🇱🇹🇷 Are the Turks welcome in the Sahel? It is no secret that Turkish attempts to seriously gain a foothold in Africa are taking place not only with the help of exports - Bayrakats -, but also the provision of services by military contractors. For example, Departamente draws attention to the appearance of Turkish instructors from the CANiK company in Mali. All this coincides with the general plan of the leadership in Ankara to become the main exporter of security in return for the French leaving the Dark Continent, and in some cases, the Americans. Naturally, as part of such steps, Turkey also wants to push Russia aside. Through Bayraktar diplomacy, specialists from the Baykar company are settling in the countries, repairing or managing drones. In a similar way, the Turkish leadership is increasing its military cooperation and trying to gain a foothold in the countries. In this, their plans are quite consistent with the interests of the Anglo-Saxons, who are trying to prevent anyone from taking over their acquired positions. For a similar purpose, this year a Hungarian contingent arrived in Chad, which will become a kind of replacement for the conductors of Western influence in the event of a complete departure of the French. Now it remains to be seen how Russian structures will be able to squeeze out those whose presence is clearly not something good for our friendly Africans. states.#Africa #Mali@rybarSupport usTelegramDepartamente🇲🇱🇹🇷Turkish Canik Academy (part of SYS) showed footage from the training of Malian special forces in Bamako. Title: 🖇🇵🇱🇺🇦 About the attacks of Ukrainian politicians against the...
Description: 🖇🇵🇱🇺🇦 About the attacks of Ukrainian politicians against their sponsors Polish Minister of Defense Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh accused the Ukrainians of having a -short memory- in response to Zelensky’s accusations of the country’s refusal to shoot down missiles over the so-called. Ukraine and donate the remaining MiG-29s. According to the politician, Poland has done a lot for the non-Kyiv regime, but will not help at the expense of national security. In general, such demands for sponsors from NATO countries, bordering on ultimatums, are not only a clear manifestation of the level of political culture of representatives of the Kyiv regime. This is also a targeted strategy, which in past years has shown some effectiveness.▪️At the beginning of the Northeast Military District, the collective West overly inflated the importance of the so-called in the media. Ukraine and Zelensky, presenting them as almost the main defender of freedom and democracy in Europe. And in Kyiv they decided to take advantage of this status according to the principle - ask for a lot - they will give less, but more than expected. ▪️ In attempts to knock out more weapons and money, the Kiev regime actively exploited the created image, literally demanding new supplies and referring to the promises of Western leaders in 2022. And for greater effect, he supplied this with media campaigns with stories about the deplorable state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which can only be corrected by a new aid package.▪️When this misfired, Zelensky’s attacks began with public accusations of the weakness of his sponsors in front of Russia, during which he depicted attempts -to take it weakly-. They were actively replicated by large media outlets, which gave a certain media effect, which was usually followed by further handouts. However, all this works only within the framework of artificially created realities, where Zelensky is irreplaceable, and the so-called. Ukraine is vital to the Western world. At the command of the sponsors, this carriage will very quickly turn into a pumpkin, as if it never existed.❗️And here several questions arise - how long is left until this moment and how exactly will yesterday’s benefactors remind the short-sighted members of the Kiev regime of their antics, which are not talked about in the West forgot.#mediatechnology #Poland #Ukraine@rybarSupport usDo RzeczySzef MON o pomocy Ukrainie: Jest granica, której ja nigdy nie przekroczęGranicą pomocy dla Ukrainy jest sprawa bezpieczeństwa Polski – oświadczył Władys ław Kosiniak-Kamysz, szef MON.

Title: 🖼 🇲🇿 Continuation of protests in Mozambique: SADC intervention...
Description: 🇲🇿 Continued protests in Mozambique: SADCS intervention at the end of October in Mozambique, daily protests by the US-sponsored opposition continue. The government has deployed armed forces to protect key city facilities, but the pogroms do not stop.▪️The goal of the organizers of the actions is to interrupt external communications with other countries, which is fraught with the creation of problems at the regional level. Thus, landlocked Zambia, Malawi, Congo and Zimbabwe are largely dependent on Mozambican ports for imports and exports.▪️For this reason, the extraordinary summit of the Southern African Development Community (SADC) will be dedicated to the protests in Mozambique. All members of the bloc unanimously support the ruling FRELIMO party in the country, so if necessary, a decision on forceful intervention will be made without serious disagreements. The opposition, fed by American organizations, is, of course, not going to give up yet. Moreover, Washington has repeatedly shown what they can do in such situations for countries they don’t like. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Mozambique@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦 Again about the demographic aspects of the so-called. Ukrain...
Description: 🇺🇦 Again about the demographic aspects of the so-called. UkraineThe American Quincy Institute for Responsible Public Administration decided to analyze the prospects of the so-called. Ukraine from the point of view of population dynamics. And we came to the conclusion that we wrote about earlier: the demographic crisis calls into question its existence as a state entity.▪️As ​​the authors note, according to the latest estimates, 29 million people live in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, compared to 48.5 million in 2001. It is difficult to calculate the exact number, and the last census was more than 20 years ago.▪️Of 11 million of all Ukrainian men aged 25 to 60 years, 7.4 have either already been mobilized, are completely unfit for service, or are employed in critical sectors and cannot be called up . At the same time, the birth rate on the so-called. Ukraine is catastrophically low.▪️The current socio-political situation and total corruption contribute to the outflow of young people who fundamentally do not want to connect their future with the so-called. Ukraine. The recruitment of Ukrainians abroad produces almost no visible results. The authors of the report note that the collective West can provide the so-called. Ukraine has weapons, but not people. And even though financial stability is ensured by external assistance, each person called up to the Armed Forces of Ukraine has a much greater effect on the local economy than it did in 2022 or 2023. And this again leads to an interesting conclusion: every day of fighting postpones the collapse of the Kyiv regime, but at the same time reduces the prospects for preserving the so-called Ukraine as a state unit in the foreseeable future for purely demographic reasons.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usResponsible StatecraftUkraine’s demographic crisis threatens its future viability as a free stateThe war has taken its toll, as men fight or flee, and few are left behind to work

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 ⚡️Leading military powers are intensifying the introductio...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️Leading military powers are intensifying the introduction of unmanned technologies in the fleet On November 7, 2024, in 🇹🇷Turkey began (on video) night testing of the Bayraktar TB3 reconnaissance and strike UAV landing on the universal landing ship TCG Anadolu (L-400) of the Navy Turkey, which, in fact, is a new type ships - -UAV carrier-. Bayraktar TB3 has a folding wing design, which allows it to take off and land on ships with short runways. Earlier, in October 2024, in 🇷🇴Romania for the Dutch Navy🇳🇱, construction of the MPSS 7000 multi-purpose support vessel began, which will become a UAV carrier. In addition, 🇵🇱Poland, 🇩🇪Germany, 🇺🇸USA, 🇬🇧Britain and other ⚡️NATO countries already have several options for unmanned sea platforms, on the basis of which reconnaissance and attack vehicles are created. ✨The enemy clearly understands the prospects for the development of the fleet and adopts the experience of the Northern Military District.✨⭐️Russia cannot boast of UAV carriers, even at the design stage. Moreover, there is still not a single unmanned surface vehicle that has been put into service and used to protect Russia’s water borders, at least in the Black Sea, where at the moment, due to bureaucratic delays, the issues of using classic warships have not been resolved. The issue of mass introduction of such unmanned technologies has long been overdue. Two majors

Title: ↩️🎬 🇷🇺 Protests have resumed in Abkhazia against an agreement ...
Description: Rybar: Video 🇷🇺 Protests have resumed in Abkhazia against an agreement allowing Russian companies to invest in projects on the territory of the republic. The local parliament has postponed its ratification, but demonstrators are demanding that the authorities vote against the document today. The stated reason for the opposition's protests is fears that if the agreement comes into force, Russian businessmen will buy up the land and prices will rise significantly. Also, those who disagree argue that after this there will be an influx of foreigners and strangers who will take all the resources of Abkhazia. The only problem is that by refusing the investment agreement with Russia, the republic will cut off the only real opportunity to improve its financial situation. And also at least somewhere to improve the condition of the infrastructure, which, due to the peculiar local management, is in the same form as it was 30 years ago. In the current situation, Abkhazia is largely faced with the question of economic survival, which is more pressing than the fears of the development of hotels in decaying cities. Resistance to the agreement in these conditions looks at least irrational, especially against the backdrop of the fact that the republic already lives entirely at the expense of the Russian budget.❗️This is also another consequence of mistakes in politics in the post-Soviet space, when they often preferred to use carrots where they needed to be used whip. The agreement could have easily been pushed through back in the 00s on the wave of recognition of Abkhazia’s independence, but then they preferred to sweep the problem under the rug. But in the end, they still had to return to the same issue. Only from a less advantageous position, bilateral economic benefits and possible reputational costs lost over 20 years. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇦🇹🇯 About -Islamic solidarity- as a source of investment On ...
Description: 🇸🇦🇹🇯 About -Islamic solidarity- as a source of investment On Monday, an extraordinary Arab-Islamic summit opened in Riyadh with the participation of leaders and representatives of 50 countries to develop a common position on the situation in the Gaza Strip and Lebanon. It was attended by the heads of all Central Asian states with the exception of Turkmenistan. Against the backdrop of proposals for urgent food and medical assistance, it is very characteristic that the most radical statements about the creation of a Palestinian state as the only solution to the conflict were made by the President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon.🔻But not this important in the context of the summit itself. During the event, the President of Tajikistan proposed creating a joint fund to finance large investment projects with Saudi Arabia. In addition, he touched upon the issues of creating logistics centers and launching air services with the Kingdom. And in this case, the Tajik leader skillfully decided to take advantage of the moment and try to monetize his participation in the summit on the situation in the Gaza Strip and Lebanon. Indeed, if successful, Tajikistan will be able to attract additional investments that the country so badly needs. #SaudiArabia #CentralAsia #Tajikistan@rybarSupport usRIA Novosti An emergency Arab-Islamic summit opened in RiyadhAn extraordinary Arab-Islamic summit with the participation of leaders and representatives of 50 countries opened on Monday in the capital of Saudi Arabia, Riyadh, to develop... Title: 🇩🇪🇷🇺 Yesterday, the Russian-language segment of the Internet ...
Description: 🇩🇪🇷🇺 Yesterday, the Russian-language segment of the Internet circulated the news that German auto brands could officially return to Russia in 2025. According to the head of one of the German consulting firms, this needs to be done as quickly as possible in order to avoid a complete loss of the Russian market. As in the case of a similar Japanese initiative, the reasons here are obvious: German concerns are suffering large losses, and the situation is further complicated by the crisis of the local industry. Therefore, they are trying to find any sources of income that could improve the situation at least a little. Sanctions against the Russian car market as a whole turned out to be a failure: European manufacturers lost profits and factories, but there were no fewer cars in the country, since Chinese manufacturers occupied the niche. As a result, the same auto brands still supply products to Russia in a roundabout way. At the same time, we still don’t believe in the imminent return of Mercedes or BMW - no command has come from the United States to lift restrictions, and the EU is still developing new sanctions packages. However, it cannot be ruled out that automakers will be more active in -clarifying the wording- and looking for new loopholes to facilitate exports to Russia.#Germany #Russia@rybarSupport usRossiyskaya GazetaGerman auto brands are threatening to return to the Russian Federation: they will be bought instead of -Chinese- - Rossiyskaya GazetaHead of the consulting company Schneider Group Ulf Schneider, in a conversation with the Berliner Zeitung, said that the German auto industry should hurry up with its return to the Russian market while there is still an opportunity to lure buyers away from Chinese brands.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 15, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday by ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 15, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday by nightfall, strike UAVs - Geranium - and missile weapons were deployed in Odessa. Explosions were reported in the port of Odessa. By morning, the enemy announced that they had recorded the takeoff of 8 strategic bombers, which had recently been working very closely in Kiev.▪️ At least 46 drones were suppressed overnight in the Crimean district of the Krasnodar Territory, there were no casualties among civilians, said the head of the region, Sergei Les, his words reports TASS. At the same time, the publication from his channel was deleted for some reason.▪️ Against the backdrop of heavy fighting in the Kursk region, where the enemy is drawing up reserves and trying to hold their positions at any cost, Yuri Podolyaka published a critical post, reporting that -beautiful reports- are coming to the top. Earlier, footage of the tragic death of our convoy on November 7, 2024, went viral on the Internet: the equipment of the 810th brigade ran into a minefield, then they also reported reports ahead of their time about full control of the road, which the enemy had in fact tightly mined. The group of troops -North- of the Russian Armed Forces writes about fierce battles in the Sudzhansky region: our troops advanced into the forests near the settlement. Malaya Loknya and Martynovka, as well as in the Olgovsky forest. The enemy continues to transfer reserves, removing units from other directions. Heavy fighting is taking place in the village. Daryino, where the Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to hold the village at any cost, throwing the marines into battle. Enemy clusters in the area of ​​the village were hit by missile strikes. Pisarevka and Glukhov, Sumy region.▪️ The Russian army broke into the industrial zone of Kupyansk, our infantry dispersed and entrenched itself, despite the heavy fire of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on equipment. There are heavy battles going on. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) there are battles for every house. The enemy blows up high-rise buildings as they retreat. Our troops continue to press along Rudnichnaya, Vasily Stus, Grushevsky and Heroes of Labor streets. ▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Army has finally taken control of the remaining part of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka (which is south of the Kurakhovsky reservoir). The assault groups of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division especially distinguished themselves.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, our troops are fighting near Novodarovka, entrenched on the southern approaches of the village.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces, with the help of two drones, struck Shebekino. One drone detonated in front of an apartment building, injuring one civilian. Another drone attacked a regular bus. In the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, a passenger car was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, three soldiers of the Special Purpose Security Unit were wounded. Our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region - several air targets were shot down. A woman and a man were wounded.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), 14 civilians were wounded: the enemy fired from 155 mm artillery with US-made M-864 shells with a cluster warhead (M-42 cumulative and M-46 fragmentation submunitions) The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo Major✨Antonovka is ours! ✨The Russian army in the Kurakhovsky direction has finally taken control of Antonovka and is rushing towards Ilyinka. Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week 8 - November 14, 2024▪️Pro-Iranian formations did not stop trying to strike Israel. Kamikaze drones were launched from the territory of Syria and Iraq, but most of them were intercepted.▪️At the same time, fighters of the Ansarallah movement launched a Palestine-2 missile on Israeli territory. The ammunition reached the center of the country, where it was intercepted near the settlement of Beit Shemesh.▪️In the Red Sea region, the Houthis resumed attacks on commercial ships and US Navy ships. The aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln, as well as the destroyers USS Stockdale and USS Spruance, were attacked by missiles and UAVs, but without consequences.▪️In response, the US-British coalition air force launched strikes on various parts of Yemen. The target was Ansaralli positions in several provinces, including Saada, Amran, Al-Hodeidah and Al-Bayda.▪️At the same time, Yemeni militias continued safaris to American drones. Thus, the Houthis were able to intercept 13 MQ-9 Reaper UAVs since the beginning of the escalation in Palestine and Israel.▪️Meanwhile, the Israeli Air Force once again struck Syria, hitting targets in the provinces of Aleppo and Idlib. One of the hits was in Saraqib, which is located on the front line with the terrorist group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham.▪️At the same time, the largest number of hits were in the province of Homs, in particular in the outskirts of El-Quseir. The target was the checkpoint of the 4th armored division of the Syrian Arab Army, as well as warehouses with ammunition for Hezbollah.▪️The Israelis did not bypass the capital of the Republic of Damascus, having worked in the Shiite district of Seyda-Zeinab. Fighters of Iran-backed pro-government formations, as well as their families, are stationed there.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 14, 2024. Russian troops launched several effective strikes on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Poltava region, a fire broke out at one of the industrial facilities in Gadyach, and in occupied Slavyansk, a dormitory was damaged, which was used as a temporary detention center for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops are conducting an offensive in several sectors at once, however, given the lack of objective control personnel, it is difficult to establish the exact configuration of the front. In the Kupyansk direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces attacked enemy positions in the area of ​​the sugar factory in KUPYANSK. According to some reports, they managed to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the city. In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian army advanced in the direction of Sukhy Yalov, clearing out the pocket between Novoukrainka and Bogoyavlenka. In the Vremyevsky direction, units of the Russian army advanced in the direction of Novodarovka, gaining a foothold on the southern approaches to the settlement.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)#BolshayaNovoselka #Gadyach #digest #report #Donetsk #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Poltava #Russia #Slavyansk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 14, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on border and rear settlements in Lebanon, including the southern suburbs of Beirut. Hezbollah responded by launching rockets, but most of the ammunition never reached its targets. In the central sector, IDF units were able to advance on the southern outskirts of Bint Jebel. However, the Israeli offensive is not without casualties - six Israeli soldiers were killed in an ambush yesterday and four more were wounded. At the same time, the Israeli Air Force worked across Syria, attacking several targets in Damascus and Homs province. Against the backdrop of the raids, the IDF press service reported the defeat of the headquarters of the military wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad and Hezbollah facilities. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: battles for Makarovka and Rovno...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremyevsky direction: battles for Makarovka and RovnopolSituation towards the end of November 14, 2024 After a long October lull in the Vremyevsky direction, activation of the front is again observed. After the liberation of Ugledar and the breakthrough to Zolotaya Niva, and then Shakhterskoye, Russian troops moved on to the systematic liquidation of the now Vremevsky wedging, advancing in the direction of Bolshaya Novoselka from several directions at once. ▪️From the eastern flank, Russian troops are gradually advancing along a broad front at the Zolotaya Niva - Shakhterskoye line. The offensive is taking place along the O0510 highway leading to Bolshaya Novoselka and the Kashlagach River. To the south, near Novodonetsky, the presence of separate detachments of the Ukrainian Armed Forces still remains.▪️At the same time, fighting intensified in Makarovka, where Russian troops hoisted a flag on one of the buildings in the village, almost completely destroyed by the fighting. Currently, about a third of the populated area is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces; the enemy is trying to counterattack in order to prevent Russian troops from gaining a foothold.▪️The greatest successes were achieved at the Levadnoye-Priyutnoye line. First, Russian troops crossed the Grushevataya gully southwest of Novodarovka. During the fighting, they managed to gain a foothold in the forest belts on the approaches to the latter; less than a kilometer remains to go to the settlement.▪️ At the same time, the attack aircraft attacked in the direction of Rovnopol, a small village with one street. Currently, fighting continues within the borders of the village. The enemy is moving assault groups to the village, trying to stop the breakthrough of the defense in the area. In the wake of the successes of the Russian army, the Ukrainian authorities announced the evacuation of several front-line settlements. At the same time, for the first time in the direction, an attempt was recorded to strike an FPV drone on a Mi-24 helicopter of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Unfortunately, the drone caught on the blades and did not cause damage to the air transport. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🪖🖇 @rybar project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke to the ...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖🖇 @rybar project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke to the vice-governors of the regions of the Central Federal District, media professionals and heads of regional SDGs as part of the seminar - ANO-Dialogue Regions - @ano_dialog. It's no secret that information coverage of a special military operation does not always go smoothly. With colleagues we discussed ways to establish dialogue along the line -region - -people - in the context of responding to negative news feeds from the Northern Military District, and argued about what methods of building ideological narratives and military-patriotic education will have an effect here and now. 📌One of the most pressing problems is the post-war integration of Northern Military District veterans as a new elite into society. As part of the seminar, it was possible to formulate several directions for the correct positioning of heroes and the formation of the necessary messages for society. The most important thing is for people to understand that the state appreciates their contribution to the victory (and the financial side here is the very last thing you need to think about). Special thanks to colleagues from Hispaniola @spainrus, Alexey Zhivov @zhivoff, Alexander Asafov @aasafov and Daniil Bezsonov @NeoficialniyBeZsonoV for a lively discussion and his vision of ways to solve problems: we were also able to look at some of them from a new angle. #WSRF #media technologies #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇸 About the American missile defense complex near t...
Description: 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇸 About the American missile defense complex near the Kaliningrad region The Polish media have been talking about only one thing over the past few days: in Redzikowo in the very north of the country on the shores of the Baltic Sea, a long-awaited military base has opened, which houses the Aegis Ashore missile defense system. The complex is part of includes three Mk.41 launchers with SM-3 Block IB and SM-3 Block IIA interceptor missiles and an AN/SPY-1D(V) radar. The range of the SM-3 Block IIA exceeds 1200 km, the radar for identifying air targets (cruise missiles, drones) as part of the missile defense system is about 500 km. In addition, this missile defense system provides for the use of new SM-6 anti-aircraft missiles, which can not be used only to protect airspace, but also against surface targets, such as ships. The Americans successfully conducted tests in 2022. The most important point is that Redzikovo is located a little more than 100 km from Kaliningrad. Taking into account the range of both anti-aircraft missiles and the anti-ship version of the SM-6, in the future the base was created to control the Baltic Sea and our fleet in the water area. This is another coin in the wallet for increasing the degree of tension in the Baltics, which Western countries have been purposefully and methodically doing in recent months . This especially began to manifest itself with the entry of Finland and Sweden into the Alliance. And with the commissioning of the new base, NATO has another reason to intensify exercises in the region as part of testing the complex. High resolution mapEnglish version#Poland #Russia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 New Israeli air raid on Syria A few hours ago...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 New Israeli air raid on Syria A few hours ago, Israeli aviation from the occupied Golan Heights launched another series of attacks on Damascus. Several hits occurred in the vicinity of the youth development center in the suburbs of Kudisiya. A three-story residential building in the western district of the Syrian capital Al-Mezze also came under fire. Israelis use it from time to time, which is primarily due to the nearby military airfield of the same name. According to the Syrian Ministry of Defense, 15 people were killed and at least 16 more were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, the Israeli media claimed that the target of the raid was a certain headquarters of the military wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad. 🔻Previously, the Israeli Air Force also attacked the province of Homs: there were hits in the outskirts of the city of El-Quseir. And although the details of the raid did not appear in the media, it is highly likely that the targets were Hezbollah facilities, which are used, among other things, for the transfer of weapons. It is noteworthy that the day before the Israelis also attacked several bridges across the Orontes River to worsen the supply of the Lebanese group. Judging by the footage of objective control that appeared on the Internet, Israeli aviation managed to destroy at least some of them. High resolution mapEnglish version#Damascus #Israel #map #Syria #Homs@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇦🇿 About Pashinyan’s desire for a -strategic deal- with Aze...
Description: 🇦🇲🇦🇿 About Pashinyan’s desire for a strategic deal with Azerbaijan Yesterday, Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan issued another tirade in the National Assembly of the republic. He excited the Armenian information field with the statement that Yerevan, in addition to -peace- with Azerbaijan, needs to formalize a strategic agreement that will be based on the concept of -real Armenia. But here’s the problem: the main problem for the so-called. The -real- Armenia lies in the fact that in Azerbaijan they do not soften the bellicose rhetoric and call the neighboring republic -Western Azerbaijan-, declaring the need for the return of Azerbaijanis to their -historical lands-. ▪️Pashinyan also came to the conclusion that the content of the Declaration of Independence is that the Republic of Armenia cannot exist, since the Armenians are looking for a homeland outside the real country. Thus, the prime minister continues to disavow the document, which hinders Azerbaijan. Let us recall that the Constitutional Court of Armenia has already ruled references to it unconstitutional. ▪️-The strategic deal between Yerevan and Baku from Pashinyan’s fantasies is very similar to consolidating the pro-Turkish vector of development of Armenia, although the parties cannot even come close to signing a peace treaty yet.▪️Pashinyan also added that he conveyed to Ilham Aliyev proposals for unblocking transport communications in the region, but, as usual, did not provide any details to the public. It can be assumed that the key issue is the withdrawal of Russian border guards and the transfer of control over transit flows in the region to Turkey. In the future, of course, we are talking about the implementation of the Middle Corridor to Central Asia. 🔻Once again, Pashinyan’s statements about the so-called. -real Armenia- show that everything goes towards satisfying other people’s geopolitical ambitions, in which the Armenians are destined for the most unenviable position of losers in the Turkic environment. And the prime minister’s new information about strategic relations with Azerbaijan is preparing Armenian society for this role. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #Russia #Turkey @rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaYerevan wants to conclude a strategic deal with Baku. It should concern the two countries' ideas about how they are going to live next to each other in the next 100 years.

Title: 🖼 🇰🇵🇷🇺 About North Korean self-propelled guns in the North M...
Description: 🇰🇵🇷🇺 About North Korean self-propelled guns in the SVOV Network zone, today a unique photo appeared with North Korean ultra-long-range 170-mm self-propelled guns M1989 Koksan moving on a railway platform somewhere in Russia (this can be noted by the high-rise buildings characteristic of our country).🔻This Quite a rare piece of artillery. The gun is installed in an open turret on a T-54 or T-62 chassis. The rate of fire does not exceed 1-2 shots per five minutes, but a powerful caliber and a range of 40-60 km compensate for the low rate of fire. Now in Ukrainian channels this photo is called proof of the arrival of North Korean soldiers in the North Korean military zone, since this type of weapon can only be used by military personnel from DPRK.❗️However, this is not direct evidence of the presence of military personnel of the DPRK Armed Forces. A comprehensive strategic partnership has been concluded between Russia and the DPRK, and our colleagues from the DPRK could easily train our units in their use. For example, the Russian Armed Forces have been using North Korean anti-tank systems for a long time. Therefore, this fact can be interpreted in two ways. There is no objective evidence yet. At the same time, the involvement of North Korean specialists would be a logical step. That people, that weapons are needed at the front, and the involvement of foreigners will solve this problem. If the other side can, then why can't we? But for now, it’s worth dwelling on the appearance of North Korean military equipment - this is really good news. After all, in addition to the Koksanov, the DPRK has other weapons, for example, the 300-mm KN09 MLRS with a range of 220 km. Or even better - the 600-mm KN-25 super-large-caliber MLRS, capable of striking at 380 km. This will allow us to expand our combat capabilities in the face of an offensive, and North Korea will have an ideal opportunity to test its equipment in real combat.#DPRK #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇲🇾 About the training of the Armed Forces of Australia a...
Description: 🇦🇺🇲🇾 About the training of the Armed Forces of Australia and Malaysia Recently, our reports on the Asia-Pacific region increasingly include Malaysia, which is actively trying to increase its role, including in the South China Sea, where they are defending their rights to build a military base , despite China's dissatisfaction. In October, Malaysian military personnel hosted units of the Armed Forces of Australia, South Korea and Great Britain on their territory, and in early November, the Malaysians made a return visit to the country of Kangaroo to participate in the event -Dask Jering-. It is already coming to an end the other day, but what's interesting is that it didn't get much media coverage. Perhaps this is due to the nature of the exercise, in which special forces units of the two countries took part. The Australians included military personnel from the Commando reconnaissance and sabotage regiment, and the Malaysians included a special detachment of Marines from the Malaysian Navy. In total, there were about 500 people who trained in covert operations behind the lines at the Holsworthy base in Sydney.🔻As we see, the Malaysians are increasingly appearing in joint maneuvers on the part of the so-called QUAD bloc. Either they accept the British, or they learn to work with Australian specialists. It will be interesting to see what Chinese reaction will be to all this action from Malaysia. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #Malaysia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇶🇮🇷🇸🇾🇹🇷 Iraqi authorities are planning to hold a regiona...
Description: 🇮🇶🇮🇷🇸🇾🇹🇷 Iraqi authorities are planning to hold a regional security conference with Turkey, Iran and Syria. The goal is to resolve common security problems, primarily the situation around the Kurdish military-political organization PKK. The motives of the Iraqi authorities can be explained by their reluctance to expose the country and population to another bloody conflict. Turkey is still planning an operation against the Kurds (especially after the terrorist attack at the TAI plant), but Iraq does not need this, both from the point of view of security and its reputation. Currently, several groups are operating on Iraqi territory, whose interests are different from the authorities in Baghdad. An international coalition that does not take into account the opinion of the official leadership, pro-Iranian groups fighting the United States, the Turks who occupied northern Iraq under the pretext of fighting the Kurds. And also the Kurds themselves, who are waging their own war. Organizing a political dialogue is an opportunity to at least try to reach some kind of compromise with all factions, each of which pursues its own interests in the country.#Iraq #Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport usRIA NovostiIraq wants to hold a regional security conferenceIraq would like to hold a regional conference in the coming months security conference to resolve common problems in this area with Turkey, Iran and Syria,... RIA Novosti, 11/13/2024

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 About the possible purchase of Typhon by the Philippine ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 About the possible purchase of Typhon by the Philippine military The story of the Typhon medium-range missile launch system deployed by the Americans in the Philippines continues. The other day, the minister of defense of the island state gave an interview in which he expressed his desire to purchase this type of weapon. The Philippines needs Typhon for, firstly, the projection of power in the disputed waters of the South China Sea, which China claims, and secondly, for the defense of its territory in the event of a hypothetical attack from the same Chinese. At first glance, there are no difficulties in purchasing this missile system. However, there are a number of potential obstacles that Philippine authorities may face. ▪️First, there is still a Missile Technology Control Regime in the world, of which the United States is a member. According to this agreement, the parties voluntarily refuse to sell missiles with a range of 300 km to other countries, which are precisely what is needed for the Typhon system. Of course, if desired, any agreements can be circumvented and alternatives can be found. However, in this case, the Philippine authorities will need to conduct long negotiations with the Americans, during which they will most likely be required to make significant concessions. ▪️Secondly, to purchase Typhon, as well as maintain its maintenance, you will need to allocate a considerable amount of funds. The Philippines, on the other hand, is a relatively poor country that purchases the same boats for its coast guard with the help of Western partners. The country's military budget mainly consists of expenses for the personnel of the armed forces and maintenance of existing military equipment. Therefore, in the Philippines, in the event of a potential purchase of Typhon, they will have to allocate even more money to defense, which could initially go to other important needs. 🔻The position of the Americans on this issue is also unclear. On the one hand, given Donald Trump's past presidency, he may again begin to shift more responsibility for the defense of allies onto themselves. The purchase of a missile system corresponds to a similar course. On the other hand, the acquisition of Typhon by the Philippine Army would mean the loss of important American leverage. Now Washington can use the deployment of a missile launcher as a tool to influence the country’s authorities, because it is located in the Philippines without any guarantees of permanent deployment. In any case, given the emerging plans for the purchase, which may not come to fruition as a whole, Manila and Washington must carefully assess the risks of such a transaction. After all, if as a result Typhon is permanently stationed in the Philippines, this could provoke a crisis in the region, as well as a harsh reaction from China.#USA #Philippines@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 About American missiles around China The American military should have announced about the imminent deployment of the Typhon medium-range missile system in Japan, how new ones appeared details of a missile launcher already in the Philippines. ▪️According to...

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇵🇸 In addition to the already usual raids by Israeli sec...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 In addition to the already familiar raids by Israeli security forces in the West Bank, today a similar operation in the small Arab settlement of Umm al-Hiran in the Negev Desert is being actively discussed on the Internet. Previously, the Israeli authorities declared all buildings in this locality illegal and subject to demolition. And while local residents were ready to dismantle their houses, no one was going to destroy the only mosque in the village. And this morning, soldiers of the Israel Defense Forces entered Umm al-Hiran with the sole purpose of finishing what they started and destroying this religious building. Several residents tried to prevent this, as a result of which they were detained. 🔻The destruction of Bedouin villages in the Negev is far from a new practice, the justification for which is often the lack of a building permit for residents, although in reality it is much more reminiscent of simply the forced relocation of the local Arab population. At the same time, no matter how the Palestinians and local Bedouins try to resist, in reality, not everyone manages to defend their settlements, including against the backdrop of a lack of unity and only unfounded support from the international community. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇩🇪The owners of the German concern Rheinmetall consider pr...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇩🇪The owners of the German concern Rheinmetall count profits from the war in UkraineAccording to company data for 9 months. In 2024, sales of weapons and ammunition reached a record level of 1.554 billion euros, and weapons and ammunition systems exceeded sales in 2023 by 608 million euros (64%). The growth was facilitated by an increase in supplies of artillery shells to Ukraine and Germany, primarily due to the inclusion in the production process of the Spanish plant Expal Munitions, purchased in 2023, which produced shells worth 352 million euros. According to our data, the price of one 155-mm projectile from Rheinmetall is 2.7 thousand euros for the Bundeswehr and about 4 thousand for Ukraine, which, taking into account the profit received, shows the enterprise's capacity in the region of 125.7 thousand projectiles in 9 months or 14 thousand per month. The volume of orders from Rheinmetall reached approximately 20 billion euros, which is 73% higher than in 2023 (11.3 billion euros). Economic growth was ensured, among other things, by orders from the Bundeswehr for the Skyranger 30 and NNBS air defense systems, the Puma infantry fighting vehicle and the Boxer armored fighting vehicle.✨For the second year now, the profits of Western military-industrial corporations have been growing, for which there is no point in slowing down the increasing production. In Ukraine, old stocks are disposed of like in a garbage dump. Two majors

Title: 🇺🇦 About the decrease in donations from the Ukrainian populatio...
Description: 🇺🇦 About the decrease in donations from the Ukrainian population of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Bloomberg published an interesting article with the headline - While the war continues, Ukrainians began to donate less for the needs of their military personnel. According to the publication, there is a sharp decline in income from donations. As an example, the two largest volunteer organizations - the Pritula Foundation and -Come Back Alive-, which faced a drop in donations of 20% and 15% compared to 2022, are given. Other funds lost even more - from 40% to 90% of income. According to the publication, this reflects a decrease in the willingness of Ukrainians to contribute to defense at a difficult moment on the front line. Ukrainian volunteers explain this by the deterioration of the financial condition of Ukrainians, as well as by the growth of economic difficulties.🔻To begin with, it is worth saying that the financial situation of the ordinary Ukrainian citizen has really worsened. And every day it becomes even more deplorable due to the degradation of the economy and the shortage of personnel caused by general mobilization. In addition, the first and second foundations (and small organizations too) in the last year and a half have been better known to the Ukrainian public as scammers , who collect money for -wunderwaffe-, and at best they bring to them outdated junk, bought at the price of an MQ-9A Reaper UAV. One story with the Pritula satellite is worth something. In addition to this, total mobilization, unpopular measures, to which is added corruption in all structures. The population's fatigue from the war is becoming increasingly noticeable, so the drop in donation income is a consequence of the accumulated problems in the country, which no one is doing or intends to do anything about.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usBloomberg.comAs War Grinds On, Ukrainians Donate Less to Their MilitaryPrivate donations to Ukraine's military effort have plummeted, an indication that Ukrainians' readiness to contribute to defense is waning as the war-torn nation looks warily to the future after Donald Trump's reelection.

Title: 🇦🇿🇦🇲🇺🇸 With the possible appointment of a senator from the ...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲🇺🇸 With the possible appointment of Florida Senator Marco Rubio to the post of Secretary of State, several countries were stirred up on the Internet. In addition to Venezuela, whose problems the senator voiced almost every week (this was his job), or the so-called Ukraine, they were worried in Baku.➖According to the Azerbaijani media, Rubio is known for his anti-Azerbaijani activities in the Senate. He and then-Senator Bob Menendez introduced an initiative on September 27, 2022, calling for the release of Armenian prisoners of war and sanctions for war crimes.➖In November 2023, Rubio supported the Senate-passed Armenia Defense Act, which would block U.S. military aid Azerbaijan. He also stated that American taxpayers' money should not be sent to Azerbaijan - a country that has brought instability to the region. I remember that for several weeks in Azerbaijan they relished the news of the detention of Bob Menendez and his subsequent resignation from office. True, he was then replaced by Ben Cardin, who continued the policy of his predecessor, calling for blocking military aid to Baku. But the Azerbaijanis forget about the role with which the Americans present themselves in the Transcaucasus. They do everything visually to show their peacekeeping efforts. But they will do this for the time being. As long as Armenia remains needed. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #USA@rybarSupport usTelegramSex, cartels, Frida Kahlo🇲🇽🇺🇸Less than a day has passed since the news that Senator Marco Rubio will become the head of the State Department under Donald Trump and the beginning of talk about the emergence of a kind of Florida lobby in American politics, like American officials have intensified their criticism of what is happening...

Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 The situation on the Korean Peninsula remains turbulent....
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 The situation on the Korean Peninsula remains turbulent. It became known that from November 8 to November 12, North Korea used GPS signal jammers over part of the Yellow Sea. South Korea claims that the purpose of such actions is an attempt to disrupt the operation of ships and aircraft located in the waters. However, no incidents related to air or sea transport occurred during this time. ▪️According to one of the South Korean ministries, the interference is associated with the transmission of signals with higher intensity than normal GPS frequencies. Such actions could affect how land, sea and air transport systems receive information. By the way, this is not the first time this has happened this year. GPS signal jammers were used in March and also in late May and early June. Therefore, in the general context of the situation, nothing extraordinary happened. 🔻Pyongyang has not yet received information explaining such actions. However, it can be assumed that they are related to the regular exercises. North Korea most likely conducted training to counter drones that could cross the border from the South. Let us recall that, according to the position of the North Korean authorities, the drone with leaflets that flew over Pyongyang in October of this year belonged to the South Korean military. It is believed that it was launched from a South Korean island located in the Yellow Sea. Perhaps, in this way, Pyongyang continues to respond to the events of October, and is also preparing for new drone launches from South Korea, which are so disturbing to the North Korean authorities. #DPRK #SouthKorea@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News AgencyN. Korea jams GPS signals for 5th straight day: JCSSEOUL, Nov. 12 (Yonhap) -- North Korea jammed GPS signals for a fifth consecutive day on T...

Title: 🇹🇯🇺🇿🇰🇬🇷🇺 About new narratives in anti-Russian media in Ce...
Description: 🇹🇯🇺🇿🇰🇬🇷🇺 About new narratives in anti-Russian media in Central Asia Recently, Radio Azattyk (a branch of the foreign agency Radio Liberty) reported that dozens of people from Central Asia who had previously received a Russian passport, but were not registered with the military, lost their citizenship. Evidence of several migrants who returned to their homeland is presented. However, what is noteworthy is what is said in this article: On the one hand, migrants do not hide the fact that they received a passport primarily for the sake of benefits and maternity capital. Many -left everything in Russia- and preferred a voluntary and quick renunciation of citizenship, so as not to be taken to war. ➖The other emphasizes that deprivation of citizenship is accompanied by gross violations. The opinion of activists is given that deprivation of citizenship of persons who are not registered with the military is a mechanism for forcing them to participate in war. The resulting situation is that the narratives contained in the article contradict each other. How can it be that deprivation of citizenship is a mechanism of coercion for war, but at the same time migrants themselves refused to fulfill the duties of a citizen of Russia. But being surprised by the actions of Radio Azattyk is like being surprised by the snow in winter. Frantic propaganda is directed against everything that happens in Russia and even without providing evidence - this is the standard way of working of this kind of media, and the migrant issue is now one of the key narratives for promoting anti-Russian sentiments in Central Asia.#multinationalism #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 14, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday mor...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 14, 2024▪️ Yesterday morning, the Russian Armed Forces launched a combined missile and drone strike on Kyiv for the first time in the last 73 days. To defeat specified targets, air-launched missiles from strategic bombers were also used.▪️ Heavy battles for Plekhovo and the settlement continue in the Kursk region. New Sorochina, the enemy fires with cannon artillery and uses many drones. The concentration of enemy efforts is evidenced by the destruction by the Marines of our 155th brigade of the heavy English tank Challenger 2, a rather rare and difficult to operate tank. The very fact of its transfer of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as a reserve to the Kursk region speaks of the enemy’s intention to hold occupied lines in our region at all costs. The group of troops - North - advanced into the village with heavy fighting. Novoivanovka and forests in the Malaya Loknya area. The enemy throws fresh reserves and NATO armored vehicles into battle and puts up fierce resistance. OTRK and -Tornado-S- crews continue to work at the collection points of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reserves in the Sumy region.▪️ From the Kupyansky direction at night, enemy resources reported the entry of our troops into Kupyansk, which marks the beginning of the battles for the city. According to enemy estimates, two columns of Russian equipment moved from the Liman First area to Kupyansk. They managed to enter the city and land troops, who dispersed to houses in the area of ​​​​Svatovskaya Street. The enemy describes the situation as -the main entrance to Kupyansk-.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction west of Petrovka, the Russian Armed Forces advanced along the railway, a depth of about 1 km. ▪️ The Russian Army continues the assault on Kurakhovo and the establishment of a wide pincer movement around this city, important for the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. So, in the north there are battles in the Ilyinka area, from the south our troops are advancing on Dalneye. The bombing of the Kurakhovskoe reservoir dam in the west by the Armed Forces of Ukraine could not prevent the movement of even civilian SUVs (the area is still under the enemy).▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of the village. Rivnopol, offensive actions of our troops continue.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are urgently forming a second line of defense, staffing it with reserves. The enemy is expecting our troops to launch a large-scale offensive.▪️ In the Kherson direction, our UAV operators and artillery are destroying enemy positions on the right bank of the river. Dnieper. The enemy responds by shelling civilians. In Kakhovka, shelling of residential areas by the Ukrainian Armed Forces led to damage to two gas pipelines. In the village of Novaya Zburevka, Golopristansky municipal district, the Nazis attacked an ambulance.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, four men were injured as a result of a kamikaze drone attack. In the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod region, a truck trailer caught fire as a result of the detonation of a drone; the fire was extinguished. Shebekino - under artillery shelling, Novaya Tavolzhanka was subjected to drops from a UAV.▪️ In the DPR, as a result of shelling by the Armed Forces of Gorlovka, 143 transformer substations were de-energized. Without light, water and heat - 60 thousand people. The summary was: Two majors Telegram TROIKA 🏴‍☠️Challenger in Kursk, fuck you. 155 OGvBrMP Pacific Fleet operates.

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🪖 Damage to property and -revaluation- of injuries: about ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🪖 Damage to property and -revaluation- of injuries: about the next high-profile amendmentsYesterday's amendments adopted by the State Duma once again became the cause of widespread popular discussion and indignation: guided by the principle -we want the best-, gentlemen deputies received a reaction -as always-. Although it would be possible to work through the expert community, ask for opinions (publicly), launch comments in the media and TG, and give the necessary explanations at the moment - and the level of popular anger would be much lower. However, this is too complicated.🔻What did they want?▪️The need for compensation and recovery of funds from damaged property did not appear out of nowhere: in the Charter there is no concept of -loved-, and such cases, alas, are not uncommon. Thus, most likely, they wanted to protect, first of all, financially responsible persons (to some extent) and begin to fight write-offs and negligent attitude towards government property. Plus, this matter applies primarily to volunteers: they may not always be financially responsible persons, they often use property listed on the balance sheet of personnel departments, and even from them the demand was not the same as from military personnel. But for military personnel, everything is not So: they were brought in under articles of embezzlement, damage to property, and causing harm - there are plenty of relevant articles on the Internet, so finding them is not a problem. Now both contract soldiers and volunteers are equal (almost).▪️A single payment of 3 million rubles for injuries led to a huge number of inappropriate payments and room for fraud. There were often cases when the five-hundredth caused cosmetic harm to their health and received their three million, joyfully rubbing their paws. According to ZMO Anna Tsivileva, the same payments created a feeling of distortion among those who suffered severe physical and emotional injuries, since for minor injuries also relied on the same amount. But on the other hand, at the same time this created broad confidence among the military personnel that their health would be guaranteed to be taken care of and everything would be compensated in the moment: and now this moment, alas, is no longer so unshakable.🔻What happened?▪️Combat magazines no one has canceled the actions: a competent (or cunning) commander will calmly handle the loss or damage of property as a result of shelling or a clash (in fact, this is how it is usually done). The fines imposed on volunteers in the form of salary and bonus for length of service amount to 30-50 thousand rubles in total. Large amounts cannot be fined. Will this help solve the systemic problem? Hardly. Will it help make up for the deficit slightly? Also doubtful. But as an instrument of administrative pressure, it will probably partially work.▪️Differentiation of wounds can (and will certainly lead) to room for a double interpretation of certain cases of harm to health (alas, there are enough problems in the field of military medicine). It is enough to remember how much people now do not like to consider shell shock and psychological trauma as a serious obstacle to continuing to complete tasks. This step will save money, but there remain risks for -free interpretation- of the amount of harm to health - and scope for excessive -savings- (because -such instructions-), as well as scope for corruption conspiracies. There will clearly be more work for the DVKR units.📌Money began to be counted - sooner or later this would have happened. The appearance of relevant bills is a ridiculous attempt to reduce the waste of money and start saving. Another question is that in their current form the bills are half-hearted and, to put it mildly, do not work. However, when did we have and what really important bill immediately began to work as it should? #WSRF #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: defeat of another Challenger 2 tank ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: defeat of another Challenger 2 tank and battles in the Sudzhansky region, situation to an end on November 13, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Russian troops continue their offensive on the eastern flank of the Sudzhansky region. 🔻The main clashes take place in the Plekhovo area, where the enemy’s focal presence remains on the eastern outskirts. To the north-west, fierce clashes continue within the borders of the village of Novaya Sorochina. Attempts by the Russian Armed Forces to gain a foothold in a populated area have been recorded, which is fraught with difficulties due to attacks from FPV drones and enemy artillery. After the initial breakthrough of the defense, the pace of advance slowed down somewhat. From the side of Novoivanovka to the southwest, unsuccessful attempts to advance to Leonidovo are recorded. 🔻Later, footage of an attack by Russian troops at the junction of the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts east of Kremyany in the direction of Novaya Sorochina along the Voronok tract in the direction of the Alder beam also appeared on the Internet. Likely. the event itself occurred simultaneously the other day simultaneously with the advance to the south from Orlyanka. The outcome of the battle is currently unknown, however, ongoing attacks in this area suggest that at least part of the forest belts southeast of Kremyany are currently occupied by Russian troops.▪️Also in the Kursk region, another British Challenger 2 tank was hit by a drone, an accurate The location of the injury is still unknown. At the same time, fire raids on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in the Sumy region continue. For this, both ballistic missiles and drones are used -Geranium-. Numerous explosions were recorded throughout the day both in the regional center and in other populated areas. Thus, in the forest north of Ivolzhanskoye, a gathering place of enemy personnel was once again hit by a strike from the Iskander OTRK. Immediately after the strikes, the official authorities announced the need to -donate blood- at the donor center. If you have any additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version #digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🛤 Destruction of the bridge near Dzhankoy: consequenc...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🛤 Destruction of the bridge near Dzhankoy: consequences A bridge collapsed on the highway from Dzhankoy to Maslovo. By a strange coincidence, the overpass on the highway was located on highway 35N-293 (aka S-010722) and passed through the railway leading from Dzhankoy north to Novoalekseevka and Melitopol. 🔻The railway is blocked at least for a while. And if the loss of the road, in principle, will not become a big problem, since there are duplicate routes and detours, then blocking the railway for some time can already create problems.▪️military logistics have been disrupted for some time: the route along the only railway line through The Kherson region is cut off (we could, of course, be wrong and there may be workarounds, but so far [judging by data from open sources] everything looks exactly like this);▪️get by the railway is only possible through the Crimean Bridge and the Kerch crossing with a ferry, which now do not lose their importance. On the footage that appeared on the Internet, at first glance, there are no traces of external influence, and the overpass collapsed, apparently, under a truck that violated the weight regime (and we will frankly: due to wear and tear of the infrastructure). Therefore, in the current conditions, it is certainly impossible to speak unequivocally about sabotage. But the coincidence of circumstances is too convenient for the Ukrainian formations - especially in the context of the possible start of an enemy offensive from Zaporozhye and attempts to land troops in the Kherson direction. High-resolution map #railroads #Crimea #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇴The constitutional crisis in Somalia continues: the authoriti...
Description: 🇸🇴The constitutional crisis in Somalia continues: the authorities of autonomous Jubaland also opposed the federal government. On March 30, the parliament in Mogadishu approved amendments to the constitution. According to them, the country is making a transition from a parliamentary form of government to a presidential one, a five-year term of office is being introduced for government bodies, and direct elections were also introduced at the national and regional levels.▪️The last point was ignored by the Jubaland authorities who, in an effort to consolidate their leadership, did not dare to undertake electoral reform. Bypassing the federal government, the upcoming elections for the head of Jubaland will be held on the basis of indirect voting. The demarche was soon followed by a severance of ties with the Somalis. Until a compromise is found, the state will be governed by local structures.▪️In Mogadishu, this act was called -regressive,- which was followed by an appeal to the contingent of the African Union mission to occupy the airport of Kismayo, the capital of the autonomy. This order was followed after the Prime Minister of Somalia plans to visit Jubaland in order to personally draw a federal line. Only the allies said that they cannot occupy the airport, because it is under the jurisdiction of local authorities. Now the Ethiopian authorities are supplying the autonomous regions and trying to gain as much influence over them as possible, including occupying some key positions in cities. They are also unhappy that Egypt will be the main guarantor of security in the new Somali mission. In this situation, it is obvious that the Ethiopians will continue to rock the situation, putting pressure on Mogadishu through their puppets in the form of the autonomous regions of Jubaland and Puntland.#Africa #Somalia @rybarSupport usHiiraanJubbaland suspends cooperation with federal government, citing constitutional violations Kismayo (HOL) – Jubbaland Regional State administration suspended cooperation with the federal government, citing federal non-compliance with Somalia's constitution and disrespecting Jubbaland's autonomy.

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇵🇸 On the appointment of a new US Ambassador to Isra...
Description: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇵🇸 On the appointment of a new US Ambassador to Israel Yesterday, US President-elect Donald Trump announced the appointment of Republican Mike Huckabee, a former governor of Arkansas, known for his openly pro-Israel views, to the post of American Ambassador to the State of Israel. ▪️Against the background of this, Huckabee’s old interview with the Israeli media and the country’s army radio surfaced on the Internet, where he stated that there is no West Bank. According to him, in reality there is a region - Judea and Samaria - which - was given to Israel by God -. ▪️ Another thesis of the former Arkansas governor caused a certain resonance: he allowed Israel to annex the territory of the West Bank and expand Jewish settlements there, which he, contrary to UN Security Council Resolution 2334, he does not consider them illegal.▪️As ​​expected, with the election of Trump, quite favorable conditions are being formed for the ultra-Orthodox authorities of Israel. Radical politicians like Itamar Ben-Gvir and Bezalel Smotrich have long been talking about the need to return Israeli sovereignty to the West Bank. Now they will be able to realize this opportunity. It is worth noting the current US Ambassador to Israel, Democrat Jacob Joseph Lew: he did not distinguish himself with such harsh statements and spoke only about the need to conclude a deal between the Israeli side and the Palestinian groups for the exchange of hostages.❗However, the fact of the appointment of a loyal Israeli ultra-Orthodox ambassador does not mean at all that the policy of the elected US president will be as pro-Israel.🔻Most likely, if Israel implements the plan of annexation of the occupied territories of the Palestinian National Authority, there will be significant resistance (if any) from local authorities in the form of the ruling Fatah party and its intelligence services will not be able to provide. At the same time, from a military point of view, the West Bank is much inferior to the Gaza Strip, where Hamas and its allies held control and which Israeli troops were able to raze to the ground. Even taking into account the existence of contacts between the Palestinian Authority and Arab countries, they will limit themselves, at best, to condemning the actions of the Israelis.▪️The chairman of the autonomy, Mahmoud Abbas, has long been considered a kind of Gauleiter of Israel: instead of repelling the constantly invading Israeli forces, the PNA security services do not hinder them in any way and even facilitate them by fighting with cells of Hamas and other groups.▪️The same applies to the armed factions -Palestinian resistance-. Yes, there will be pockets of discontent and escalation of the conflict, but it is unlikely that this will develop into an acute phase of confrontation, much less stop the Israeli government. Taking all this into account, Israel will be able to relatively quickly digest the West Bank, reducing it to a state pressed against the Dead Sea or the Jordan River a small Palestinian enclave.📌 Well, the ultra-Orthodox Israeli government will be able to begin implementing such a plan whenever there is a need for a new armed conflict, the presence of which would help the ruling coalition led by Benjamin Netanyahu justify its presence in power.#Israel #USA #Palestine@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇹🇩About the operation -Haskanit- in the area of ​​Lake Chad ...
Description: 🇹🇩About the operation -Haskanit- in the Lake Chad region. The operation of the Chadian armed forces -Haskanit-, carried out since the beginning of November, despite the unfounded accusations of the West of killing civilians, is yielding results.▪️Chad's General Staff announced the liquidation of 96 Boko Haram militants and the death 17 military personnel during the cleanup. The marshy terrain with a huge number of small islands, of course, complicates the process, which is why the fighting will continue for a long time. It is noteworthy that following the announcement of the start of the operation, the question was raised about Chad’s withdrawal from the Joint Special Forces (MNJTF), which, in addition to it includes Nigeria, Benin and Cameroon.▪️The government argues for this by the general ineffectiveness of the organization, which is why it has failed to ensure security in the Lake Chad region. And now the Chadian authorities are dealing with this issue themselves. One can understand this position - it is worth remembering only the recent news from Nigeria, where almost every month some new group raises its head. At the same time, the armed forces, which were reformed by American advisers, cannot cope with this. For Debi the Younger, this is a successful political move and in many ways reminds the Chadian public of his father. At one time, Idriss Deby also led successful military campaigns against various militants, finding support in society. High-resolution map English version#Africa #map #Chad@rybarSupport us
